atk-s0517a:1694_7: “Abbhā muttova candimā”ti ca padassa niddese mahikādīnampi vuttattā ettha ādisaddalopo katoti veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1694_8: Gāthāniddese no passāso no assāsoti so soyeva attho paṭisedhena visesetvā vutto.
atk-s0517a:1694_9: Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti asammussanatāya tameva assāsaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ sati nāmāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1694_11: Ettāvatā ānāpānesu sati ānāpānassatīti attho vutto hoti.
atk-s0517a:1695_0: Idāni sativaseneva “yassā”ti vuttaṃ puggalaṃ niddisitukāmo yo assasati,
atk-s0517a:1695_7: tassa sati passāsaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti attho.
atk-s0517a:1695_10: Te hi dhammā iminā yoginā pariggayhamānattā pariggahā,
atk-s0517a:1695_12: Tattha sabbesaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ aññamaññaparivārattā parivāraṭṭhena paripuṇṇā.
atk-s0517a:1695_14: Catasso bhāvanātiādīni subhāvitāti vuttapadassa atthavasena vuttāni.
atk-s0517a:1695_21: Yattha yattha ākaṅkhatīti yesu yesu jhānesu yāsu yāsu vipassanāsu sace icchati.
atk-s0517a:1695_22: Tattha tatthāti tesu tesu jhānesu tāsu tāsu vipassanāsu.
atk-s0517a:1695_34: Tena vuccati yānīkatāti evaṃ katattāyeva te yuttayānasadisā katā hontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1696_0: Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ vatthusminti soḷasasu vatthūsu ekekasmiṃ.
atk-s0517a:1696_3: Sampayuttacittasatīnaṃ saheva sakasakakiccakaraṇato anulomapaṭilomavasena yojetvā te dve dhammā dassitā.
atk-s0517a:1696_4: Tena vuccati vatthukatāti evaṃ bhūtattāyeva katapatiṭṭhā hontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1696_5: Yena yena cittaṃ abhinīharatīti pubbappavattito apanetvā yattha yattha bhāvanāvisese cittaṃ upaneti.
atk-s0517a:1696_6: Tena tena sati anuparivattatīti tasmiṃ tasmiṃyeva bhāvanāvisese sati anukūlā hutvā pubbappavattito nivattitvā pavattati. “Yena,
atk-s0517a:1696_7: tenā”ti cettha “yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī”tiādīsu viya bhummattho veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1696_8: Tena vuccati anuṭṭhitāti evaṃ karaṇatoyeva taṃ taṃ bhāvanaṃ anugantvā ṭhitā hontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1696_9: Ānāpānassatiyā satipadhānattā vatthukatānuṭṭhitapadesu satiyā saha yojanā katāti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1697_0: Yasmā pana paripuṇṇāyeva paricitā honti vaḍḍhitā laddhāsevanā,
atk-s0517a:1697_4: pubbabhāgāya vā satiyā pariggahetabbe pariggaṇhanto yogī.
atk-s0517a:1697_5: Jināti pāpake akusale dhammeti samucchedavasena lāmake kilese jināti abhibhavati.
atk-s0517a:1697_7: Dhammesu hi jinantesu taṃdhammasamaṅgīpuggalopi jināti nāma.
atk-s0517a:1697_8: Te ca dhammā satiṃ avihāya attano pavattikkhaṇe jinitumāraddhā jitāti vuccanti yathā “bhuñjitumāraddho bhutto”ti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1697_13: yathā sammā gado assāti sugatoti atthavikappe da-
atk-s0517a:1698_0: Cattāro susamāraddhāti cattāro susamāraddhatthāti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1698_2: Susamāraddhāti padassa atthāpi hi idha susamāraddhāti vuttāti veditabbā,
atk-s0517a:1698_6: Yasmā pana subhāvitāyeva susamāraddhā honti, na aññe,
atk-s0517a:1698_9: tasmā taṃ avatvā tappaccanīkānaṃ susamūhatattho vutto.
atk-s0517a:1698_11: tena susamāraddhassa sikhāppatto attho vutto hoti.
atk-s0517a:1699_1: Puna tasseva padassa aññampi atthavikappaṃ dassento susamantiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1699_2: Tattha tattha jātāti tasmiṃ sikhāppattabhāvanāvisese jātā.
atk-s0517a:1699_5: Bodhipakkhiyāti bujjhanaṭṭhena bodhīti laddhanāmassa ariyassa pakkhe bhavattā bodhipakkhiyā.
atk-s0517a:1699_14: Idaṃ samanti idaṃ maggakkhaṇe dhammajātaṃ samucchedavasena kilese sameti vināsetīti samaṃ nāma.
atk-s0517a:1699_17: Idaṃ susamanti idaṃ nibbānaṃ sabbasaṅkhatavisamāpagatattā suṭṭhu samanti susamaṃ nāma.
atk-s0517a:1699_18: Ñātanti bodhipakkhiyasaṅkhātaṃ samaṃ asammohato ñāṇena ñātaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1699_20: Tadeva dvayaṃ teneva cakkhunā viya diṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1699_21: Viditanti tadeva dvayaṃ santāne uppādanena ārammaṇakaraṇena ca paṭiladdhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1699_23: “Asallīnaṃ asammuṭṭhā asāraddho ekagga”nti purimassa purimassa padassa atthappakāsanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1700_4: “samā ca susamā ca samasusamā”ti vattabbe ekadesasarūpekasesaṃ katvā “susamā” icceva vuttā yathā nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca nāmarūpanti.
atk-s0517a:1700_6: idaṃ susama”nti pana anaññāpekkhaṃ katvā napuṃsakavacanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0517a:1701_0: Āraddhaṃ hoti vīriyaṃ asallīnanti ayaṃ pana āraddhavacanassa ujukatthoyeva.
atk-s0517a:1701_1: Upaṭṭhitā satītiādīni pana sampayuttavīriyassa upakārakadhammadassanatthaṃ vuttāni,
atk-s0517a:1701_3: Purimena atthena suṭṭhu samāraddhāti susamāraddhā ca,
atk-s0517a:1701_4: iminā atthena susamā āraddhāti susamāraddhā ca ekasese kate “susamāraddhā”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0517a:1702_7: Ubhayena pubbañca anu ca paricitāti attho vutto hoti.
atk-s0517a:1702_8: Upari soḷasa vatthūni vitthāretvā vacanato idha saṅkhipitvā “paṭinissaggānupassī”ti antimameva dassitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1702_9: Yasmā sikhāppattabhāvanassa sabbāpi ānāpānassatiyo punappunaṃ yathāruci pavattanato anuparicitāpi honti.
atk-s0517a:1704_0: Buddhotipadassa abhāvepi buddhenātipade yo so buddho,
atk-s0517a:1704_4: Yo hi ācariyaṃ vinā saccāni paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0517a:1704_10: Tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇīti tesu ca saccesu sabbaññubhāvaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0517a:1704_14: Balesu ca vasībhāvanti dasasu ca tathāgatabalesu issarabhāvaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0517a:1704_17: Tattha sabbesu dhammesu appaṭihatañāṇanimittānuttaravimokkhādhigamaparibhāvitaṃ khandhasantānaṃ upādāya paṇṇattiko,
atk-s0517a:1704_18: sabbaññutapadaṭṭhānaṃ vā saccābhisambodhimupādāya paṇṇattiko sattaviseso buddho.
atk-s0517a:1705_1: Idāni byañjanato vibhāvento buddhoti kenaṭṭhena buddhotiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1705_2: Tattha yathā loke avagantā avagatoti vuccati,
atk-s0517a:1705_6: Sabbaññutāya buddhoti sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1705_7: Sabbadassāvitāya buddhoti sabbadhammānaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā diṭṭhattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1705_8: Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti aññena abodhanīyato sayameva buddhattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1705_9: Visavitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavisavanato padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1705_10: Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhotiādīhi chahi pariyāyehi cittasaṅkocakaradhammappahānena niddakkhayavibuddho
atk-s0517a:1705_11: puriso viya sabbakilesaniddakkhayavibuddhattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1705_12: Saṅkhā saṅkhātanti atthato ekattā saṅkhātenāti vacanassa koṭṭhāsenāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1705_14: Savāsanānaṃ sabbakilesānaṃ pahīnattā ekantavacanena visesetvā ekantavītarāgotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1705_16: Ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddhoti gamanatthānaṃ dhātūnaṃ bujjhanatthattā bujjhanatthāpi dhātuyo gamanatthā honti,
atk-s0517a:1705_17: tasmā ekāyanamaggaṃ gatattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1707_0: Nāvā uttarasetu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”ti. –
atk-s0517a:1708_3: Atha vā ekena ayitabbo maggoti ekāyanamaggo.
atk-s0517a:1708_11: tasmā ekāyanamaggoti sammāsambuddhānaṃ ayanabhūto maggoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1708_18: pubbabhāge nānāmukhabhāvanānayappavattopi aparabhāge ekaṃ nibbānameva gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1708_20: Eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti na parehi buddhattā buddho,
atk-s0517a:1708_21: kiṃ pana sayameva anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1708_22: Abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṃ bodhoti pariyāyavacanametaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1708_23: Tattha yathā nīlarattaguṇayogā nīlo paṭo ratto paṭoti vuccati,
atk-s0517a:1709_0: Tato paraṃ buddhoti netaṃ nāmantiādi “atthamanugatā ayaṃ paññattī”ti ñāpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1709_15: Taṃ nemittikampi nāmaṃ vimokkhante bhavaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0517a:1709_18: Bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhāti mahābodhirukkhamūle yathāvuttakkhaṇe sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhena saha.
atk-s0517a:1709_21: Yadidaṃ buddhoti yā ayaṃ buddhoti paññatti,
atk-s0517a:1710_0: “Yathā buddhena desitā”tigāthāpādassa pana iminā padabhājanīye vuttatthena ayaṃ saṃsandanā –
atk-s0517a:1710_3: Yathāsaddena saṅgahitā dasa yathatthā ca yathā buddhena desitā,
atk-s0517a:1710_4: yena pakārena desitāti pakāratthassa ca yathāsaddassa,
atk-s0517a:1710_5: sabhāvatthassa ca yathāsaddassa sarūpekasesavasena ekasesaṃ katvā “yathā”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1710_6: Padabhājanīye panassa yathatthesu ekekassa yojanāvasena “desito”ti ekavacanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0517a:1711_0: “Soti gahaṭṭho vā hoti pabbajito vā”ti vuttattā ādipadepi yassa gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vāti vuttameva hoti.
atk-s0517a:1711_2: Pabhāsetīti attano ñāṇassa pākaṭaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0517a:1712_4: Dhūmarajā muttoti dhūmato ca rajato ca mutto.
atk-s0517a:1712_5: Rāhugahaṇā vippamuttoti rāhuno candassa āsannupakkilesattā dvīhi upasaggehi visesetvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1712_10: Yasmā pana candopi sayaṃ bhāsanto tapanto virocanto imaṃ okāsalokaṃ obhāseti,
atk-s0517a:1712_11: bhikkhu ca paññāya bhāsanto tapanto virocanto imaṃ khandhādilokaṃ paññāya obhāseti,
atk-s0517a:1712_14: Ativisadatarābhasūriyopamaṃ aggahetvā kasmā candopamā gahitāti ce?
atk-s0517a:1712_15: Sabbakilesapariḷāhavūpasamena santassa bhikkhuno santaguṇayuttacandopamā anucchavikāti gahitāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1712_16: Evaṃ ānāpānassatibhāvanāsiddhisādhakaṃ yogāvacaraṃ thunitvā imāni terasa vodāne ñāṇānīti tāni ñāṇāni nigametvā dassetīti.
atk-s0517a:1715_1: Satokāriñāṇaniddese mātikāyaṃ idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhu.
atk-s0517a:1716_0: Araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vāti idamassa ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvanānurūpasenāsanapariggahaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1716_1: Imassa hi bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu anuvisaṭaṃ cittaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhiārammaṇaṃ abhiruhituṃ na icchati,
atk-s0517a:1716_3: Tasmā seyyathāpi nāma gopo kūṭadhenuyā sabbaṃ khīraṃ pivitvā vaḍḍhitaṃ kūṭavacchaṃ dametukāmo dhenuto
atk-s0517a:1716_4: apanetvā ekamante mahantaṃ thambhaṃ nikhaṇitvā tattha yottena bandheyya,
atk-s0517a:1716_5: athassa so vaccho ito cito ca vipphanditvā palāyituṃ asakkonto tameva thambhaṃ upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vā,
atk-s0517a:1716_6: evameva imināpi bhikkhunā dīgharattaṃ rūpārammaṇādirasapānavaḍḍhitaṃ duṭṭhacittaṃ dametukāmena rūpādiārammaṇato
atk-s0517a:1716_7: apanetvā araññaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā suññāgāraṃ vā pavesetvā tattha assāsapassāsathambhe satiyottena bandhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1716_8: Evamassa taṃ cittaṃ ito cito ca vipphanditvāpi pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇaṃ alabhamānaṃ satiyottaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0517a:1716_9: palāyituṃ asakkontaṃ tamevārammaṇaṃ upacārappanāvasena upanisīdati ceva upanipajjati ca.
atk-s0517a:1717_0: “Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha;
atk-s0517a:1719_1: Atha vā yasmā idaṃ kammaṭṭhānappabhede muddhabhūtaṃ sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ visesādhigamadiṭṭhadhammasukhavihārapadaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1719_2: ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ itthipurisahatthiassādisaddasamākulaṃ gāmantaṃ apariccajitvā na sukaraṃ bhāvetuṃ
atk-s0517a:1719_4: Agāmake pana araññe sukaraṃ yogāvacarena idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā ānāpānacatukkajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0517a:1719_5: tadeva pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ.
atk-s0517a:1719_6: Tasmā tassa anurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ upadisanto bhagavā “araññagato vā”tiādimāha,
atk-s0517a:1720_1: so yathā vatthuvijjācariyo nagarabhūmiṃ passitvā suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā “ettha nagaraṃ māpethā”ti upadisati,
atk-s0517a:1720_2: sotthinā ca nagare niṭṭhite rājakulato mahāsakkāraṃ labhati,
atk-s0517a:1720_3: evamevaṃ yogāvacarassa anurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ upaparikkhitvā “ettha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitabba”nti upadisati,
atk-s0517a:1720_4: tato tattha kammaṭṭhānamanuyuttena yoginā kamena arahatte patte “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ labhati.
atk-s0517a:1720_6: Yathā hi mahādīpirājā araññe tiṇagahanaṃ vā vanagahanaṃ vā pabbatagahanaṃ vā nissāya nilīyitvā vanamahiṃsagokaṇṇasūkarādayo mige gaṇhāti,
atk-s0517a:1720_7: evamevaṃ ayaṃ araññādīsu kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjanto bhikkhu yathākkamena sotāpattisakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattamagge
atk-s0517a:1725_0: Tattha araññagatoti upari vuttalakkhaṇaṃ yaṃkiñci pavivekasukhaṃ araññaṃ gato.
atk-s0517a:1725_3: Ettha ca ṭhapetvā araññañca rukkhamūlañca avasesasattavidhasenāsanaṃ gatopi “suññāgāragato”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0517a:1725_5: “so vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajati araññaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñja”nti.
atk-s0517a:1725_6: Evamassa ututtayānukūlaṃ dhātucariyānukūlañca ānāpānassatibhāvanānurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ upadisitvā alīnānuddhaccapakkhikaṃ
atk-s0517a:1725_8: Athassa nisajjāya daḷhabhāvaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ pavattanasamatthataṃ ārammaṇapariggahūpāyañca dassento pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvātiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1725_11: Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti uparimasarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
atk-s0517a:1725_13: Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0517a:1726_0: Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā.
atk-s0517a:1726_1: So satova assasati sato passasatīti so bhikkhu evaṃ nisīditvā evañca satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā taṃ satiṃ avijahanto sato eva assasati sato passasati,
atk-s0517a:1727_1: te pakāre dassetuṃ dīghaṃ vā assasantotiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1727_2: Tattha dīghaṃ vā assasantoti dīghaṃ vā assāsaṃ pavattayanto.
atk-s0517a:1727_6: Kadāci hi manussā hatthiahiādayo viya kālavasena dīghaṃ assasanti ca passasanti ca,
atk-s0517a:1727_8: Aññathā hi cuṇṇavicuṇṇā assāsapassāsā dīgharassā nāma na honti.
atk-s0517a:1727_9: Tasmā te dīghaṃ kālaṃ pavisantā ca nikkhamantā ca dīghā,
atk-s0517a:1727_10: rassaṃ kālaṃ pavisantā ca nikkhamantā ca rassāti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1727_11: Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu upari vuttehi navahākārehi dīghaṃ assasanto ca passasanto ca dīghaṃ assasāmi,
atk-s0517a:1729_0: “Dīgho rasso ca assāso, passāsopi ca tādiso;
atk-s0517a:1731_0: Navannañcassa ākārānaṃ ekenākārena kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā sampajjatīti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1731_2: Sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī passasissāmīti sikkhatīti sakalassa assāsakāyassādimajjhapariyosānaṃ viditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto assasissāmīti sikkhati.
atk-s0517a:1731_3: Sakalassa passāsakāyassādimajjhapariyosānaṃ viditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto passasissāmīti sikkhati.
atk-s0517a:1731_4: Evaṃ viditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto ñāṇasampayuttacittena assasati ceva passasati ca.
atk-s0517a:1732_6: ayaṃ adhipaññāsikkhāti imā tisso sikkhāyo tasmiṃ ārammaṇe tāya satiyā tena manasikārena sikkhati āsevati
atk-s0517a:1732_8: Tattha yasmā purimanayena kevalaṃ assasitabbaṃ passasitabbameva ca,
atk-s0517a:1732_10: ito paṭṭhāya pana ñāṇuppādanādīsu yogo karaṇīyo.
atk-s0517a:1732_11: Tasmā tattha “assasāmīti pajānāti passasāmīti pajānāti”cceva vattamānakālavasena pāḷiṃ vatvā ito paṭṭhāya kattabbassa ñāṇuppādanādino ā-
atk-s0517a:1732_12: kārassa dassanatthaṃ “sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmī”tiādinā nayena anāgatakālavasena pāḷi āropitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1733_1: sikkhatīti oḷārikaṃ assāsapassāsasaṅkhātaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento paṭippassambhento nirodhento vūpasamento assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
atk-s0517a:1734_0: Tatrevaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā ca passaddhi ca veditabbā –
atk-s0517a:1734_1: imassa hi bhikkhuno pubbe apariggahitakāle kāyo ca cittañca sadarathā honti oḷārikā.
atk-s0517a:1734_2: Kāyacittānaṃ oḷārikatte avūpasante assāsapassāsāpi oḷārikā honti,
atk-s0517a:1734_6: Yadā panassa kāyopi cittampi pariggahitā honti,
atk-s0517a:1734_8: Tesu vūpasantesu assāsapassāsā sukhumā hutvā pavattanti,
atk-s0517a:1734_11: Seyyathāpi purisassa dhāvitvā pabbatā vā orohitvā mahābhāraṃ vā sīsato oropetvā ṭhitassa oḷārikā assāsapassāsā honti,
atk-s0517a:1734_14: Yadā panesa taṃ parissamaṃ vinodetvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca allasāṭakaṃ hadaye katvā sītāya chāyāya nipanno hoti,
atk-s0517a:1734_15: athassa te assāsapassāsā sukhumā honti “atthi nu kho,
atk-s0517a:1734_18: Tathā hissa pubbe apariggahitakāle “oḷārikoḷārike kāyasaṅkhāre passambhemī”ti ābhogasamannāhāramanasikāro natthi,
atk-s0517a:1734_20: Tenassa apariggahitakālato pariggahitakāle kāyasaṅkhāro sukhumo hoti.
atk-s0517a:1738_1: dutiyajjhānūpacāre sukhumo”ti evaṃ heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato uparūparijjhānūpacārepi sukhumataraṃ icchanti.
atk-s0517a:1738_2: Sabbesaṃyeva pana matena apariggahitakāle pavattakāyasaṅkhāro pariggahitakāle paṭippassambhati,
atk-s0517a:1739_18: Tattha pubbe vuttanayeneva purimassa purimassa pacchimena pacchimena paṭippassaddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1739_20: Ayaṃ tāvettha kāyānupassanāvasena vuttassa paṭhamacatukkassa anupubbapadavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a:1740_0: Yasmā panettha idameva catukkaṃ ādikammikassa kammaṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1740_1: itarāni pana tīṇi catukkāni ettha pattajjhānassa vedanācittadhammānupassanāvasena,
atk-s0517a:1740_2: tasmā imaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā ānāpānacatukkajjhānapadaṭṭhānāya vipassanāya saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ
atk-s0517a:1740_3: pāpuṇitukāmena ādikammikena kulaputtena visuddhimagge vuttanayena sīlaparisodhanādīni sabbakiccāni katvā
atk-s0517a:1740_4: sattaṅgasamannāgatassa ācariyassa santike pañcasandhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1740_5: Tatrime pañca sandhayo uggaho paripucchā upaṭṭhānaṃ appanā lakkhaṇanti.
atk-s0517a:1741_0: Evaṃ pañcasandhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhanto attanāpi na kilamati,
atk-s0517a:1741_2: Tasmā thokaṃ uddisāpetvā bahuṃ kālaṃ sajjhāyitvā evaṃ pañcasandhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā ācariyassa
atk-s0517a:1741_3: santike vā aññattha vā aṭṭhārasa dosayutte vihāre vajjetvā pañcaṅgasamannāgate senāsane vasantena upacchinnakhuddakapalibodhena
atk-s0517a:1741_4: katabhattakiccena bhattasammadaṃ paṭivinodetvā sukhanisinnena ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇena cittaṃ sampahaṃsetvā
atk-s0517a:1741_5: ācariyuggahato ekapadampi aparihāpentena idaṃ ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1744_8: Tattha iminā ādikammikena kulaputtena paṭhamaṃ gaṇanāya idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1744_9: Gaṇentena pana pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā na ṭhapetabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1744_12: Pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā ṭhapentassa hi sambādhe okāse cittuppādo vipphandati sambādhe vaje sanniruddhagogaṇo viya.
atk-s0517a:1744_13: Dasannaṃ upari nentassa gaṇananissitova cittuppādo hoti.
atk-s0517a:1744_14: Antarā khaṇḍaṃ dassentassa “sikhāppattaṃ nu kho me kammaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1745_0: Gaṇentena ca paṭhamaṃ dandhagaṇanāya dhaññamāpakagaṇanāya gaṇetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1745_1: Dhaññamāpako hi nāḷiṃ pūretvā “eka”nti vatvā okirati,
atk-s0517a:1745_2: puna pūrento kiñci kacavaraṃ disvā chaḍḍento “ekaṃ eka”nti vadati.
atk-s0517a:1745_5: taṃ gahetvā “ekaṃ eka”ntiādiṃ katvā yāva “dasa dasā”ti pavattamānaṃ pavattamānaṃ upalakkhetvāva gaṇetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1745_6: Tassa evaṃ gaṇayato nikkhamantā ca pavisantā ca assāsapassāsā pākaṭā honti.
atk-s0517a:1746_0: Athānena taṃ dandhagaṇanaṃ dhaññamāpakagaṇanaṃ pahāya sīghagaṇanāya gopālakagaṇanāya gaṇetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1746_1: Cheko hi gopālako sakkharādayo ucchaṅgena gahetvā rajjudaṇḍahattho pātova vajaṃ gantvā gāvo piṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0517a:1746_2: paharitvā palighatthambhamatthake nisinno dvāraṃ pattaṃ pattaṃyeva gāvaṃ “eko dve”ti sakkharaṃ khipitvā
atk-s0517a:1746_4: Tiyāmarattiṃ sambādhe okāse dukkhaṃ vutthagogaṇo nikkhamanto aññamaññaṃ upanighaṃsanto vegena vegena puñjapuñjo hutvā nikkhamati.
atk-s0517a:1746_5: So vegena vegena “tīṇi cattāri pañca dasā”ti gaṇetiyeva,
atk-s0517a:1746_6: evamassāpi purimanayena gaṇayato assāsapassāsā pākaṭā hutvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ punappunaṃ sañcaranti.
atk-s0517a:1746_7: Tato tena “punappunaṃ sañcarantī”ti ñatvā anto ca bahi ca aggahetvā dvārappattaṃ dvārappattaṃyeva gahetvā “eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañca,
atk-s0517a:1746_8: eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañca cha,
atk-s0517a:1746_9: eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañca cha satta…pe…
atk-s0517a:1746_10: aṭṭha nava dasā”ti sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gaṇetabbameva.
atk-s0517a:1746_11: Gaṇanāpaṭibaddhe hi kammaṭṭhāne gaṇanabaleneva cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti arittupatthambhanavasena caṇḍasote nāvāṭhapanamiva.
atk-s0517a:1747_0: Tassevaṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gaṇayato kammaṭṭhānaṃ nirantaraṃ pavattaṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:1747_1: Atha “nirantaraṃ pavattatī”ti ñatvā anto ca bahi ca vātaṃ apariggahetvā purimanayeneva vegena vegena gaṇetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1747_2: Antopavisanavātena hi saddhiṃ cittaṃ pavesayato abbhantaraṃ vātabbhāhataṃ medapūritaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0517a:1747_3: Bahinikkhamanavātena saddhiṃ cittaṃ nīharato bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe cittaṃ vikkhipati.
atk-s0517a:1747_4: Phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhokāse pana satiṃ ṭhapetvā bhāventasseva bhāvanā sampajjati.
atk-s0517a:1747_6: “anto ca bahi ca vātaṃ apariggahetvā purimanayeneva vegena vegena gaṇetabba”nti.
atk-s0517a:1748_1: Yāva vinā gaṇanāya assāsapassāsārammaṇe sati santiṭṭhati.
atk-s0517a:1748_2: Bahi visaṭavitakkavicchedaṃ katvā assāsapassāsārammaṇe sati saṇṭhāpanatthaṃyeva hi gaṇanāti.
atk-s0517a:1749_0: Evaṃ gaṇanāya manasi katvā anubandhanāya manasi kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1749_1: Anubandhanā nāma gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā satiyā nirantaraṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1749_3: Ādimajjhapariyosānāni tassānugamane ādīnavā ca heṭṭhā vuttāyeva.
atk-s0517a:1750_0: Tasmā anubandhanāya manasikarontena na ādimajjhapariyosānavasena manasi kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1750_1: apica kho phusanāvasena ca ṭhapanāvasena ca manasi kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1750_2: Gaṇanānubandhanāvasena viya hi phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi,
atk-s0517a:1750_3: phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva pana gaṇento gaṇanāya ca phusanāya ca manasi karoti,
atk-s0517a:1750_4: tattheva gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhanto,
atk-s0517a:1750_5: appanāvasena ca cittaṃ ṭhapento “anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1750_6: Svāyamattho aṭṭhakathāsu vuttapaṅguḷadovārikopamāhi idheva pāḷiyaṃ vuttakakacūpamāya ca veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1751_1: seyyathāpi paṅguḷo dolāya kīḷataṃ mātāputtānaṃ dolaṃ khipitvā tattheva dolāthambhamūle nisinno kamena
atk-s0517a:1751_2: āgacchantassa ca gacchantassa ca dolāphalakassa ubho koṭiyo majjhañca passati,
atk-s0517a:1751_3: na ca ubhokoṭimajjhānaṃ dassanatthaṃ byāvaṭo hoti,
atk-s0517a:1751_4: evameva bhikkhu sativasena upanibandhanatthambhamūle ṭhatvā assāsapassāsadolaṃ khipitvā tattheva nimitte
atk-s0517a:1751_5: satiyā nisīdanto kamena āgacchantānañca gacchantānañca phuṭṭhaṭṭhāne assāsapassāsānaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1751_6: satiyā anugacchanto tattheva cittaṃ ṭhapetvā passati,
atk-s0517a:1751_7: na ca tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ byāvaṭo hoti.
atk-s0517a:1752_1: seyyathāpi dovāriko nagarassa anto ca bahi ca purise “ko tvaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1752_4: kiṃ vā te hatthe”ti na vīmaṃsati.
atk-s0517a:1752_7: evameva imassa bhikkhuno antopaviṭṭhavātā ca bahinikkhantavātā ca na bhārā honti,
atk-s0517a:1753_0: Kakacūpamā pana “nimittaṃ assāsapassāsā”tiādinā nayena idha vuttāyeva.
atk-s0517a:1753_1: Idha panassa āgatāgatavasena amanasikāramattameva payojananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1754_0: Idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaroto kassaci na cireneva nimittañca uppajjati,
atk-s0517a:1754_2: Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato pabhuti yathā sāraddhakāyassa mañce vā pīṭhe vā nisīdato mañcapīṭhaṃ onamati vikūjati,
atk-s0517a:1754_4: asāraddhakāyassa pana nisīdato neva mañcapīṭhaṃ onamati na vikūjati,
atk-s0517a:1754_8: evamevaṃ gaṇanāvasena manasikārakālato pabhuti anukkamato oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodhavasena kāyadarathe vūpasante kāyopi cittampi lahukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1755_0: Tassa oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhe sukhumaassāsapassāsanimittārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ pavattati.
atk-s0517a:1755_1: Tasmimpi niruddhe aparāparaṃ tato sukhumataraṃ sukhumataraṃ assāsapassāsanimittārammaṇaṃ pavattatiyeva.
atk-s0517a:1756_0: Yathā hi aññāni kammaṭṭhānāni uparūpari vibhūtāni honti,
atk-s0517a:1756_2: Idaṃ pana uparūpari bhāventassa sukhumattaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0517a:1756_4: Evaṃ anupaṭṭhahante pana tasmiṃ tena bhikkhunā “ācariyaṃ pucchissāmī”ti vā “naṭṭhaṃ dāni me kammaṭṭhāna”nti vā uṭṭhāyāsanā na gantabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1756_5: Iriyāpathaṃ vikopetvā gacchato hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ navanavameva hoti.
atk-s0517a:1757_1: tena bhikkhunā kammaṭṭhānassa anupaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ ñatvā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “ime assāsapassāsā nāma kattha atthi,
atk-s0517a:1757_7: tathā asaññībhūtānaṃ matānaṃ catutthajjhānasamāpannānaṃ rūpārūpabhavasamaṅgīnaṃ nirodhasamāpannāna”nti ñatvā evaṃ attanāva attā paṭicodetabbo “nanu,
atk-s0517a:1757_17: Athānena pakatiphuṭṭhavasena cittaṃ ṭhapetvā manasikāro pavattetabbo.
atk-s0517a:1757_18: Ime hi dīghanāsikassa nāsāpuṭaṃ ghaṭṭentā pavattanti,
atk-s0517a:1757_20: Tasmānena imaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ ghaṭṭentīti nimittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1757_21: Imameva hi atthavasaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ bhagavatā – “nāhaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1757_24: Kiñcāpi hi yaṃkiñci kammaṭṭhānaṃ satassa sampajānasseva sampajjati,
atk-s0517a:1757_25: ito aññaṃ pana manasikarontassa pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1757_26: Idaṃ pana ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ garukaṃ garukabhāvanaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhaputtānaṃ mahāpurisānaṃyeva manasikārabhūmibhūtaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1757_31: Tasmā ettha balavatī sati ca paññā ca icchitabbā.
atk-s0517a:1758_0: Yathā hi maṭṭhasāṭakassa tunnakaraṇakāle sūcipi sukhumā icchitabbā,
atk-s0517a:1758_2: evamevaṃ maṭṭhasāṭakasadisassa imassa kammaṭṭhānassa bhāvanākāle sūcipaṭibhāgā satipi sūcipāsavedhanapaṭibhāgā
atk-s0517a:1758_4: Tāhi ca pana satipaññāhi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na te assāsapassāsā aññatra pakatiphuṭṭhokāsā pariyesitabbā.
atk-s0517a:1759_0: Yathā hi kassako khettaṃ kasitvā balībadde muñcitvā gocaramukhe katvā chāyāya nisinno vissameyya,
atk-s0517a:1759_1: athassa te balībaddā vegena aṭaviṃ paviseyyuṃ.
atk-s0517a:1759_3: so puna te gahetvā yojetukāmo na tesaṃ anupadaṃ gantvā aṭaviṃ āhiṇḍati.
atk-s0517a:1759_4: Atha kho rasmiñca patodañca gahetvā ujukameva tesaṃ nipātanatitthaṃ gantvā nisīdati vā nipajjati vā.
atk-s0517a:1759_5: Atha te goṇe divasabhāgaṃ caritvā nipātanatitthaṃ otaritvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca paccuttaritvā ṭhite disvā
atk-s0517a:1759_6: rasmiyā bandhitvā patodena vijjhanto ānetvā yojetvā puna kammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0517a:1759_7: Evamevaṃ tena bhikkhunā na te assāsapassāsā aññatra pakatiphuṭṭhokāsā pariyesitabbā.
atk-s0517a:1759_8: Satirasmiṃ pana paññāpatodañca gahetvā pakatiphuṭṭhokāse cittaṃ ṭhapetvā manasikāro pavattetabbo.
atk-s0517a:1759_9: Evaṃ hissa manasikaroto na cirasseva te upaṭṭhahanti nipātanatitthe viya goṇā.
atk-s0517a:1759_10: Tato tena satirasmiyā bandhitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne yojetvā paññāpatodena vijjhantena punappunaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1759_12: Taṃ panetaṃ na sabbesaṃ ekasadisaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1759_13: apica kho kassaci sukhasamphassaṃ uppādayamāno tūlapicu viya kappāsapicu viya vātadhārā viya ca upaṭṭhātīti ekacce āhu.
atk-s0517a:1760_1: idañhi kassaci tārakarūpaṃ viya maṇiguḷikā viya muttāguḷikā viya ca,
atk-s0517a:1760_2: kassaci kharasamphassaṃ hutvā kappāsaṭṭhi viya dārusārasūci viya ca,
atk-s0517a:1760_3: kassaci dīghapāmaṅgasuttaṃ viya kusumadāmaṃ viya dhūmasikhā viya ca,
atk-s0517a:1760_4: kassaci vitthataṃ makkaṭakasuttaṃ viya valāhakapaṭalaṃ viya padumapupphaṃ viya rathacakkaṃ viya candamaṇḍalaṃ viya sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ viya ca upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0517a:1760_5: tañca panetaṃ yathā sambahulesu bhikkhūsu suttantaṃ sajjhāyitvā nisinnesu ekena bhikkhunā “tumhākaṃ kīdisaṃ
atk-s0517a:1760_6: hutvā idaṃ suttaṃ upaṭṭhātī”ti vutte eko “mayhaṃ mahatī pabbateyyā nadī viya hutvā upaṭṭhātī”ti āha.
atk-s0517a:1760_8: Añño “mayhaṃ eko sītacchāyo sākhāsampanno phalabhārabharito rukkho viyā”ti.
atk-s0517a:1760_9: Tesañhi taṃ ekameva suttaṃ saññānānatāya nānato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:1760_10: Evaṃ ekameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ saññānānatāya nānato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:1761_0: Evaṃ upaṭṭhite pana nimitte tena bhikkhunā ācariyassa santikaṃ gantvā ārocetabbaṃ “mayhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0517a:1761_3: kammaṭṭhānaṃ punappunaṃ manasi karohi sappurisā”ti vattabbo.
atk-s0517a:1761_5: Evamassāyaṃ ito pabhuti ṭhapanāvasena bhāvanā hoti.
atk-s0517a:1764_0: Tassevaṃ nimittupaṭṭhānato pabhuti nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti,
atk-s0517a:1764_3: Athānena taṃ nimittaṃ neva vaṇṇato manasi kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1764_5: apica kho khattiyamahesiyā cakkavattigabbho viya kassakena sāliyavagabbho viya ca āvāsādīni satta asappāyāni
atk-s0517a:1764_6: vajjetvā tāneva satta sappāyāni sevantena sādhukaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1764_7: atha naṃ evaṃ rakkhitvā punappunaṃ manasikāravasena vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ gamayitvā dasavidhaṃ appanākosallaṃ sampādetabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1764_9: Tassevaṃ ghaṭentassa visuddhimagge vuttānukkamena tasmiṃ nimitte catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattanti.
atk-s0517a:1764_10: Evaṃ nibbattacatukkapañcakajjhāno panettha bhikkhu sallakkhaṇāvivaṭṭanāvasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0517a:1764_11: pārisuddhiṃ pattukāmo tadeva jhānaṃ pañcahākārehi vasippattaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0517a:1764_13: So hi samāpattito vuṭṭhāya assāsapassāsānaṃ samudayo karajakāyo ca cittañcāti passati.
atk-s0517a:1764_14: Yathā hi kammāragaggariyā dhamamānāya bhastañca purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicca vāto sañcarati,
atk-s0517a:1764_17: cittañca taṃsampayutte ca dhamme arūpanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0517a:1765_0: Evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesati,
atk-s0517a:1765_1: pariyesanto ca taṃ disvā tīsupi addhāsu nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ ārabbha kaṅkhaṃ vitarati,
atk-s0517a:1765_2: vitiṇṇakaṅkho kalāpasammasanavasena “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā udayabbayānupassanāya
atk-s0517a:1765_3: pubbabhāge uppanne obhāsādayo dasa vipassanupakkilese pahāya upakkilesavimuttaṃ udayabbayānupassanāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:1765_4: “maggo”ti vavatthapetvā udayaṃ pahāya bhaṅgānupassanaṃ patvā nirantaraṃ bhaṅgānupassanena bhayato upaṭṭhitesu
atk-s0517a:1765_5: sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindanto virajjanto vimuccanto yathākkamena cattāro ariyamagge pāpuṇitvā arahattaphale
atk-s0517a:1765_6: patiṭṭhāya ekūnavīsatibhedassa paccavekkhaṇāñāṇassa pariyantaṃ patto sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyo hoti.
atk-s0517a:1765_7: Ettāvatā cassa gaṇanaṃ ādiṃ katvā vipassanāpariyosānā ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā samattā hotīti.
atk-s0517a:1766_0: Itaresu pana tīsu catukkesu yasmā visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayo nāma natthi,
atk-s0517a:1766_2: Pītipaṭisaṃvedīti pītiṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
atk-s0517a:1766_3: Tattha dvīhākārehi pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato ca asammohato ca.
atk-s0517a:1767_2: tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
atk-s0517a:1768_1: Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ khayato vayato sammasati,
atk-s0517a:1768_2: tassa vipassanākkhaṇe lakkhaṇapaṭivedhena asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
atk-s0517a:1768_8: Passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāranti oḷārikaṃ oḷārikaṃ cittasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento,
atk-s0517a:1768_13: Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesu “saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā,
atk-s0517a:1768_14: ete dhammā cittapaṭibaddhā cittasaṅkhārā”ti vacanato saññāsampayuttā vedanāti evaṃ vedanānupassanānayena idaṃ catukkaṃ bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1769_0: Tatiyacatukkepi catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena cittapaṭisaṃviditā veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1769_1: Abhippamodayaṃ cittanti cittaṃ modento pamodento hāsento pahāsento assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
atk-s0517a:1769_2: Tattha dvīhākārehi abhippamodo hoti samādhivasena ca vipassanāvasena ca.
atk-s0517a:1770_2: so samāpattikkhaṇe sampayuttāya pītiyā cittaṃ āmodeti pamodeti.
atk-s0517a:1770_4: Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ khayato vayato sammasati.
atk-s0517a:1770_5: Evaṃ vipassanākkhaṇe jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittaṃ āmodeti pamodeti.
atk-s0517a:1770_6: Evaṃ paṭipanno “abhippamodayaṃ cittaṃ assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1771_0: Samādahaṃ cittanti paṭhamajjhānādivasena ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento,
atk-s0517a:1771_1: tāni vā pana jhānāni samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ khayato vayato sammasato vipassanākkhaṇe
atk-s0517a:1771_3: evaṃ uppannāya khaṇikacittekaggatāya vasenapi ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento “samādahaṃ
atk-s0517a:1772_0: Vimocayaṃ cittanti paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇehi cittaṃ mocento vimocento,
atk-s0517a:1772_4: tāni vā pana jhānāni samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ khayato vayato sammasati.
atk-s0517a:1772_5: So vipassanākkhaṇe aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāto cittaṃ mocento vimocento,
atk-s0517a:1772_11: paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānato cittaṃ mocento vimocento assasati ceva passasati ca.
atk-s0517a:1772_14: Evaṃ cittānupassanāvasena idaṃ catukkaṃ bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1773_0: Catutthacatukke pana aniccānupassīti ettha tāva aniccaṃ veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1773_8: nibbattānaṃ tenevākārena aṭṭhatvā khaṇabhaṅgena bhedoti attho.
atk-s0517a:1773_9: Aniccānupassanāti tassā aniccatāya vasena rūpādīsu “anicca”nti anupassanā.
atk-s0517a:1773_11: Tasmā evaṃbhūto assasanto ca passasanto ca idha “aniccānupassī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1774_0: Virāgānupassīti ettha pana dve virāgā khayavirāgo ca accantavirāgo ca.
atk-s0517a:1774_3: Virāgānupassanāti tadubhayadassanavasena pavattā vipassanā ca maggo ca.
atk-s0517a:1774_4: Tāya duvidhāyapi anupassanāya samannāgato hutvā assasanto ca passasanto ca “virāgānupassī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1775_0: Paṭinissaggānupassīti etthāpi dve paṭinissaggā pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ca pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo ca.
atk-s0517a:1775_3: Vipassanāti tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati,
atk-s0517a:1775_4: saṅkhatadosadassanena ca tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandatīti pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cāti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1775_5: Maggo samucchedavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati,
atk-s0517a:1775_6: ārammaṇakaraṇena ca nibbāne pakkhandatīti pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cāti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1775_7: Ubhayampi pana purimapurimañāṇānaṃ anuanu passanato anupassanāti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1775_8: Tāya duvidhāyapi paṭinissaggānupassanāya samannāgato hutvā assasanto ca passasanto ca “paṭinissaggānupassī
atk-s0517a:1776_1: “virāgānupassī”ti tato balavatarāya saṅkhāresu virajjanasamatthāya vipassanāya vasena,
atk-s0517a:1776_3: “paṭinissaggānupassī”ti maggassa āsannabhūtāya atitikkhāya vipassanāya vasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1778_1: Idāni yathānikkhittaṃ mātikaṃ paṭipāṭiyā bhājetvā dassetuṃ idhāti imissā diṭṭhiyātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1778_2: Tattha imissā diṭṭhiyātiādīhi dasahi padehi sikkhattayasaṅkhātaṃ sabbaññubuddhasāsanameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1778_3: Tañhi buddhena bhagavatā diṭṭhattā diṭṭhīti vuccati,
atk-s0517a:1778_23: Apicetaṃ sikkhattayasaṅkhātaṃ sakalaṃ pāvacanaṃ bhagavatā diṭṭhattā sammādiṭṭhipaccayattā sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamattā ca diṭṭhi.
atk-s0517a:1778_27: Attano kārakaṃ apāye apatamānaṃ dhāretīti dhammo.
atk-s0517a:1778_29: Dhammo ca so vinayo cāti dhammavinayo,
atk-s0517a:1778_30: kusaladhammehi vā akusaladhammānaṃ esa vinayoti dhammavinayo.
atk-s0517a:1778_33: dhamme jāneyyāsi ime dhammā virāgāya saṃvattanti,
atk-s0517a:1778_35: dhāreyyāsi eso dhammo eso vinayo etaṃ satthusāsana”nti.
atk-s0517a:1781_13: Saṃsāradhammato hi sokādidhammato vā esa visuddhaṃ nibbānaṃ nayati,
atk-s0517a:1781_18: Yasmā vā dhammā eva abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā pahātabbā bhāvetabbā sacchikātabbā ca,
atk-s0517a:1781_20: na sattesu na jīvesu cāti dhammavinayo.
atk-s0517a:1781_21: Sātthasabyañjanatādīhi aññesaṃ vacanato padhānaṃ vacananti pavacanaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1781_25: satthubhūtaṃ vā sāsanantipi satthusāsanaṃ. “Yo vo, ānanda,
atk-s0517a:1781_26: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto,
atk-s0517a:1781_27: so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti hi dhammavinayova satthāti vutto.
atk-s0517a:1781_29: Yasmā pana imasmiṃyeva sāsane sabbākāraānāpānassatisamādhinibbattako bhikkhu vijjati,
atk-s0517a:1781_31: tasmā tattha tattha “imissā”ti ca “imasmi”nti ca ayaṃ niyamo katoti veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1782_0: Puthujjanakalyāṇako vātiādinā ca bhikkhusaddassa vacanatthaṃ avatvā idhādhippetabhikkhuyeva dassito.
atk-s0517a:1782_1: Tattha puthujjano ca so kilesānaṃ asamucchinnattā,
atk-s0517a:1782_5: Sotāpanno vā sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā.
atk-s0517a:1783_0: Araññaniddese vinayapariyāyena tāva “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ arañña”nti āgataṃ.
atk-s0517a:1783_1: Suttantapariyāyena āraññakaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti āgataṃ.
atk-s0517a:1783_3: abhidhammo nippariyāyadesanāti abhidhammapariyāyena araññaṃ dassetuṃ nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlāti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1783_7: Indakhīloti cettha gāmassa vā nagarassa vā ummāro.
atk-s0517a:1784_0: Rukkhamūlaniddese rukkhamūlassa pākaṭattā taṃ avatvāva yatthātiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1784_5: Mañcopi hi nisajjāyapi okāsattā idha āsanesu vutto.
atk-s0517a:1784_14: “Yatthā”tiādīhi sabbapadehi rukkhamūlassa sandacchāyatā janavivittatā ca vuttā hoti.
atk-s0517a:1784_16: Taṃ samūhaṃ bhinditvā vitthārento gahaṭṭhehi vā pabbajitehi vāti āha.
atk-s0517a:1784_18: Yassa senāsanassa samantā gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi pabbatagahanaṃ vanagahanaṃ nadīgahanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1784_21: Yaṃ pana aḍḍhayojanikaṃ vā yojanikaṃ vā hoti,
atk-s0517a:1785_2: Pāsādoti dve kaṇṇikā gahetvā kato dīghapāsādo.
atk-s0517a:1785_4: Guhāti iṭṭhakāguhā silāguhā dāruguhā paṃsuguhāti evañhi khandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1785_5: Vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vihāroti samantā parihārapathaṃ antoyeva rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni ca dassetvā katasenāsanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1785_8: Pabbataguhā vā bhūmiguhā vāti idaṃ dvayaṃ visesetvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1785_10: idha pana nisinnassa bhāvanārambhasabbhāvato nisajjārambhapariyosānadassanatthaṃ nisinnoti niṭṭhānavacanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0517a:1785_11: Yasmā pana ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya nisinnassa kāyo ujuko hoti,
atk-s0517a:1785_12: tasmā byañjane ādaraṃ akatvā adhippetama eva dassento ujukotiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1785_13: Tattha ṭhito supaṇihitoti ujukaṃ paṇihitattā ujuko hutvā ṭhito,
atk-s0517a:1785_19: Tenāhaniyyānaṭṭhoti mukhasaddassa jeṭṭhakatthavasena saṃsārato niyyānaṭṭho vutto.
atk-s0517a:1785_21: Sabbehi panetehi padehi pariggahitaniyyānaṃ satiṃ katvāti attho vutto hoti.
atk-s0517a:1786_1: Bāttiṃsāya ākārehīti tāsu tāsu avatthāsu yathākkamena labbhamānānaṃ anavasesapariyādānavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1786_6: Ekaggatā eva hi nānārammaṇesu cittassa avikkhipanato avikkhepoti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1786_12: Sato kārī hotīti ettha yasmā ñāṇasampayuttā eva sati satīti adhippetā, yathāha –
atk-s0517a:1787_3: Ayampi kālo dīghattā addhāno viya addhānoti vutto.
atk-s0517a:1787_4: “Assasatī”ti ca “passasatī”ti ca assāsañca passāsañca visuṃ visuṃ vatvāpi bhāvanāya nirantarappavattidassanatthaṃ
atk-s0517a:1787_6: Chando uppajjatīti bhāvanābhivuddhiyā bhiyyobhāvāya chando jāyati.
atk-s0517a:1787_9: Assāsapassāsāpi cittaṃ vivattatīti assāsapassāse nissāya paṭibhāganimitte uppajjante pakatiassāsapassāsato cittaṃ nivattati.
atk-s0517a:1787_10: Upekkhā saṇṭhātīti tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte upacārappanāsamādhipattiyā puna samādhāne byāpārābhāvato tatramajjhattupekkhā saṇṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0517a:1787_11: Navahākārehīti ettha bhāvanārambhato pabhuti pure chanduppādā “assasatipi passasatipī”ti vuttā tayo ākārā,
atk-s0517a:1787_15: Pakatiassāsapakatipassāse nissāya uppannanimittampi assāsapassāsāti nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-s0517a:1787_16: Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti taṃ ārammaṇaṃ upecca tiṭṭhatīti sati upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0517a:1787_19: Kāyo upaṭṭhānanti so kāyo upecca tiṭṭhati ettha satīti upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0517a:1787_20: No satīti so kāyo sati nāma na hotīti attho.
atk-s0517a:1787_23: Taṃ kāyaṃ anupassatīti samathavipassanāvasena yathāvuttaṃ kāyaṃ anugantvā jhānasampayuttañāṇena vā vipassanāñāṇena vā passati.
atk-s0517a:1788_0: Mātikāya kāyādīnaṃ padānaṃ abhāvepi imassa catukkassa kāyānupassanāvasena vuttattā idāni vattabbaṃ “kāye
atk-s0517a:1788_2: Kāye kāyānupassanāti bahuvidhe kāye tassa tassa kāyassa anupassanā.
atk-s0517a:1788_7: Atha vā kāye ahanti vā mamanti vā itthīti vā purisoti vā gahetabbassa kassaci ananupassanato tasseva kāyamattassa anupassanāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1788_8: Upari vedanāsu vedanānupassanātiādīsu tīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0517a:1789_1: Taṃ kāyanti aniddiṭṭhepi nāmarūpakāye kāyasaddena tassāpi saṅgahitattā niddiṭṭhaṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1789_4: Anupassanā ca bhāvanā ca vuttatthā eva.
atk-s0517a:1789_5: Dīghaṃ assāsapassāsavasenātiādi ānāpānassatibhāvanāya ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1789_7: Tattha cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti paṭiladdhajjhānassa vipassanākāle cittekaggataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1789_8: Viditā vedanāti sāmaññato udayadassanena viditā vedanā.
atk-s0517a:1789_9: Viditā upaṭṭhahantīti khayato vayato suññato viditā upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0517a:1789_10: Viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchantīti sāmaññato vayadassanena viditā vināsaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0517a:1789_13: Imesu pana tīsu vuttesu sesā rūpadhammāpi vuttā honti.
atk-s0517a:1789_14: Kasmā pana ime tayo eva vuttāti ce?
atk-s0517a:1789_21: Sā ca sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇaggāhakena vipassanāñāṇena sampayuttā ati viya apākaṭā.
atk-s0517a:1789_23: vitakko ñāṇapatirūpakattā ñāṇato visuṃ katvā duppariggaho.
atk-s0517a:1789_28: Sopi cassa vitakko pākaṭo hotīti evaṃ duppariggahesu vuttesu sesā vuttāva hontīti.
atk-s0517a:1789_29: Imesaṃ pana padānaṃ niddese kathaṃ viditā vedanā uppajjantīti pucchitvā taṃ avissajjetvāva vedanuppādassa
atk-s0517a:1789_30: viditatteyeva vissajjite vedanāya viditattaṃ vissajjitaṃ hotīti kathaṃ vedanāya uppādo vidito hotītiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1789_34: Vitakkavāre pana “phassasamudayā phassanirodhā”ti avatvā phassaṭṭhāne saññāsamudayā saññānirodhāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1790_0: Aniccato manasikarototiādīsu ca “vedanaṃ aniccato manasikaroto”tiādinā nayena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vāre so soyeva dhammo yojetabbo.
atk-s0517a:1790_1: Yasmā pana vipassanāsampayuttā vedanā vipassanākiccakaraṇe asamatthattā vipassanāya anupakārikā,
atk-s0517a:1790_6: Vitakkasahāyā hi vipassanā sakakiccaṃ karoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0517a:1791_0: “Paññā attano dhammatāya aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0517a:1791_1: vitakke pana ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā dente sakkoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0517a:1791_2: Yathā hi heraññiko kahāpaṇaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā sabbabhāgesu oloketukāmo samānopi na cakkhutaleneva parivattetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0517a:1791_3: aṅgulipabbehi pana parivattetvā parivattetvā ito cito ca oloketuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0517a:1791_4: evameva na paññā attano dhammatāya aniccādivasena ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0517a:1791_5: abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana āhananapariyāhananarasena vitakkena ākoṭentena viya parivattentena viya ca ādāyādāya dinnameva nicchetuṃ sakkotī”ti.
atk-s0517a:1792_0: Tasmā vedanāsaññānaṃ vipassanāya anupakārattā lakkhaṇamattavaseneva dassetuṃ “vedanāya saññāyā”ti tattha tattha ekavacanena niddeso kato.
atk-s0517a:1792_2: tattako eva vitakkassāti dassetuṃ “vitakkāna”nti tattha tattha bahuvacanena niddeso katoti vattuṃ yujjati.
atk-s0517a:1793_1: Puna dīghaṃ assāsapassāsavasenātiādi ānāpānassatibhāvanāya sampattiṃ bhāvanāphalañca dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1793_13: Imasmiṃ ārammaṇeti ettha pana “kāye”tipadena saṅgahite nāmarūpakāyasaṅkhāte saṅkhatārammaṇe teneva kamena magge nibbānārammaṇe ca.
atk-s0517a:1793_16: Pajānātīti puggalo pajānanā paññāti puggalo paññāya pajānātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1793_19: Ettha ca kammatthe sāmivacanaṃ yathā rañño upaṭṭhānanti.
atk-s0517a:1793_24: Tañhi vodāyati visujjhati tena cittanti vodānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1793_27: Tena vipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesu samathavipassanānaṃ yuganaddhatā vuttā hoti.
atk-s0517a:1793_28: Sati pana sabbatthikattā tadubhayasamatāya upakārikāti samaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1793_35: Paṭivijjhatīti taṃ taṃ sabhāvaṃ asammohato paṭivijjhati.
atk-s0517a:1793_36: Ettha ca “ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhāna”ntiādīhi sammā paṭivedho vutto.
atk-s0517a:1793_37: Ettheva ca vodānaṭṭhapaṭivedhassa vuttattā tena ekalakkhaṇā anavajjaṭṭhanikkilesaṭṭhaparamaṭṭhā lakkhaṇahāravasena vuttāyeva honti. Yathāha –
atk-s0517a:1795_0: Vuttā bhavanti sabbe, so hāro lakkhaṇo nāmā”ti. ;
atk-s0517a:1796_0: Anavajjaṭṭho nikkilesaṭṭho cettha avikkhepasaṅkhātassa samassa attho payojananti samattho,
atk-s0517a:1796_1: vodānaṭṭho vipassanāmaggavodānaṃ sandhāya samameva atthoti samattho,
atk-s0517a:1796_2: phalavodānaṃ sandhāya maggavodānasaṅkhātassa samassa atthoti samattho,
atk-s0517a:1796_3: paramaṭṭho pana samameva atthoti vā nibbānapayojanattā sabbassa samassa atthoti vā samattho,
atk-s0517a:1796_4: taṃ vuttappakāraṃ samañca samatthañca ekadesasarūpekasesaṃ katvā samatthañca paṭivijjhatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1796_6: maggo ca tisso ca visuddhiyo maggaphalakkhaṇeyeva,
atk-s0517a:1796_7: vimokkho ca vijjā ca khaye ñāṇañca maggakkhaṇeyeva,
atk-s0517a:1796_10: Dhammavāre ime dhamme imasmiṃ ārammaṇe samodhānetīti nibbānaṃ ṭhapetvā sesā yathāyogaṃ veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1796_13: Ekekacatukkavasenettha niyyāne dassitepi catukkantogadhassa ekekassāpi bhāgassa niyyānassa upanissayattā ekekabhāgavasena niyyānaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1796_14: Na hi ekekaṃ vinā niyyānaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0517a:1798_0: 169. Rassaniddese ittarasaṅkhāteti parittasaṅkhāte kāle. Sesamettha vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1799_1: Sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvediniddese arūpadhammesu vedanāya oḷārikattā sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇasaṃvedikā vedanā vuttā,
atk-s0517a:1799_3: taṃ sañjānātīti evaṃ vedanāvisayassa ākāraggāhikā saññā,
atk-s0517a:1799_10: Evaṃ tīsu khandhesu vuttesu taṃnissayo viññāṇakkhandho vuttova hoti.
atk-s0517a:1799_12: Nāmakāyo cāti idaṃ pana nāmena nibbānassapi saṅgahitattā lokuttarānañca avipassanupagattā taṃ apanetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1799_13: “Kāyo”ti hi vacanena nibbānaṃ apanītaṃ hoti nibbānassa rāsivinimuttattā.
atk-s0517a:1799_14: Ye ca vuccanti cittasaṅkhārāti “saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittapaṭibaddhā cittasaṅkhārā”ti
atk-s0517a:1799_15: evaṃ vuccamānāpi cittasaṅkhārā idha nāmakāyeneva saṅgahitāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1799_16: Mahābhūtāti mahantapātubhāvato mahābhūtasāmaññato mahāparihārato mahāvikārato mahantabhūtattā cāti mahābhūtā. Te pana –
atk-s0517a:1799_19: cattāro mahābhūte upādāya nissāya amuñcitvā pavattarūpanti attho.
atk-s0517a:1799_21: cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo rūpaṃ saddo gandho raso itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ hadayavatthu
atk-s0517a:1799_22: ojā kāyaviññatti vacīviññatti ākāsadhātu rūpassa lahutā mudutā kammaññattā upacayo santati jaratā aniccatāti
atk-s0517a:1799_25: Assāsapassāse nissāya uppannaṃ paṭibhāganimittampi tadeva nāmaṃ labhati pathavīkasiṇādīni viya.
atk-s0517a:1799_26: Rūpasarikkhakattā rūpanti ca nāmaṃ labhati “bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0517a:1799_27: Nimittañca upanibandhanāti satiupanibandhanāya nimittabhūtaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ phusanaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1799_28: Ye ca vuccanti kāyasaṅkhārāti “assāsapassāsā kāyikā ete dhammā kāyapaṭibaddhā kāyasaṅkhārā”ti evaṃ vuccamānāpi
atk-s0517a:1799_29: kāyasaṅkhārā idha rūpakāyeneva saṅgahitāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1800_0: Te kāyā paṭividitā hontīti jhānakkhaṇe assāsapassāsanimittakāyā vipassanākkhaṇe avasesarūpārūpakāyā ārammaṇato paṭividitā honti,
atk-s0517a:1800_2: Assāsapassāsavasena paṭiladdhajjhānassa yogissa uppannavipassanāmaggepi sandhāya dīghaṃ assāsapassāsavasenātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1802_4: Jhānavipassanāsu viratiabhāvepi pāpābhāvamattameva saṃvaro nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1804_15: Kāyasaṅkhāresu hi passambhitesu kāyassa ānamanādayo ca passambhitāyeva hontīti.
atk-s0517a:1804_16: Yathārūpehi kāyasaṅkhārehi kāyassa na ānamanādikā hoti,
atk-s0517a:1804_17: tathārūpaṃ santaṃ sukhumampi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhayanti ca,
atk-s0517a:1804_19: tañca santaṃ sukhumaṃ passambhayanti ca sambandhato veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1804_23: Yadi evaṃ sukhumakepi assāsapassāse passambhayaṃ assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatīti codakena codanā āraddhā hoti.
atk-s0517a:1804_24: Atha vā kirāti codakavacanattā asaddahanatthe asahanatthe parokkhatthe ca yujjatiyeva,
atk-s0517a:1804_25: evaṃ sukhumānampi passambhanaṃ sikkhatīti na saddahāmi na sahāmi apaccakkhaṃ meti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1805_0: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ sukhumānaṃ passambhane sante.
atk-s0517a:1805_1: Vātūpaladdhiyā ca pabhāvanā na hotīti assāsapassāsavātassa upaladdhiyā.
atk-s0517a:1805_3: Assāsapassāsavātaṃ upalabbhamānassa tadārammaṇassa bhāvanāviññāṇassa pabhāvanā uppādanā na hoti,
atk-s0517a:1805_4: tassa ārammaṇassa bhāvanā na hotīti attho.
atk-s0517a:1805_5: Assāsapassāsānañca pabhāvanā na hotīti bhāvanāya sukhumakānampi assāsapassāsānaṃ nirodhanato tesañca uppādanā pavattanā na hotīti attho.
atk-s0517a:1805_6: Ānāpānassatiyā ca pabhāvanā na hotīti assāsapassāsābhāvatoyeva tadārammaṇāya bhāvanāviññāṇasampayuttāya satiyā ca pavattanā na hoti.
atk-s0517a:1805_7: Tasmāyeva taṃsampayuttassa ānāpānassatisamādhissa ca bhāvanā na hoti.
atk-s0517a:1805_8: Na ca naṃ tanti ettha ca nanti nipātamattaṃ “bhikkhu ca na”ntiādīsu viya.
atk-s0517a:1805_9: Taṃ vuttavidhiṃ samāpattiṃ paṇḍitā na samāpajjantipi tato na vuṭṭhahantipīti sambandho.
atk-s0517a:1805_12: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ passambhane sante eva.
atk-s0517a:1806_0: Yathā kathaṃ viyāti yathā taṃ vuttavidhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1806_1: tathā taṃ kathaṃ viyāti upamaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0517a:1806_13: Sukhumasaddanimittārammaṇatāpīti tadā sukhumānampi saddānaṃ niruddhattā anuggahitasaddanimittassa anārammaṇampi
atk-s0517a:1806_14: sukhumataraṃ saddanimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā sukhumataraṃ saddanimittārammaṇampi cittaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0517a:1807_0: Passambhayantiādīsu “passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti vuttā assāsapassāsā kāyoti vā “passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti
atk-s0517a:1807_1: ettha assāsapassāsā kāyoti vā yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1807_2: Bhāvanāvisuddhiyā kāyasaṅkhāre passambhamānepi oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhemīti yogino ābhoge sati tenādarena ativiya passambhati.
atk-s0517a:1808_0: Aṭṭha anupassanāñāṇānīti “dīghaṃ rassaṃ sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti vuttesu catūsu vatthūsu assāsavasena catasso,
atk-s0517a:1808_2: Aṭṭha ca upaṭṭhānānussatiyoti “dīghaṃ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā
atk-s0517a:1808_3: hotī”tiādinā nayena vuttesu catūsu vatthūsu assāsavasena catasso,
atk-s0517a:1808_6: Cattāri suttantikavatthūnīti bhagavatā ānāpānassatisuttante vuttattā paṭhamacatukkavasena cattāri suttantikavatthūnīti.
atk-s0517a:1810_1: Dutiyacatukkassa pītipaṭisaṃvediniddese uppajjati pīti pāmojjanti ettha pītīti mūlapadaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1810_4: Yā pīti pāmojjantiādīsu yā “pītī”ti ca “pāmojja”nti ca evamādīni nāmāni labhati,
atk-s0517a:1810_10: Yathā vā bhesajjānaṃ vā telānaṃ vā uṇhodakasītodakānaṃ vā ekatokaraṇaṃ modanāti vuccati,
atk-s0517a:1810_12: upasaggavasena pana padaṃ maṇḍetvā āmodanā pamodanāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1810_19: Yathā hi dhanino dhanaṃ paṭicca somanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0517a:1810_20: evaṃ pītimatopi pītiṃ paṭicca somanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:1810_23: Pītimā pana puggalo kāyacittānaṃ uggatattā abbhuggatattā “udaggo”ti vuccati,
atk-s0517a:1810_26: Anabhiraddhassa hi mano dukkhapadaṭṭhānattā na attano mano nāma hoti,
atk-s0517a:1810_27: abhiraddhassa sukhapadaṭṭhānattā attano mano nāma hoti,
atk-s0517a:1810_30: Sā pana yasmā na aññassa kassaci attano manatā,
atk-s0517a:1810_33: Sesamettha ca upari ca heṭṭhā vuttanayena yojetvā veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1811_3: cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ samathassa ca vipassanāya ca bhūmi.
atk-s0517a:1811_4: Kāyikanti pasādakāyaṃ vinā anuppattito kāye niyuttanti kāyikaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1812_3: Sesamettha catukke heṭṭhā paṭhamacatukke vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1814_8: yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti hi ettha pana sampayuttakadhammo mānasoti vutto.
atk-s0517a:1816_0: Appattamānaso sekkho, kālaṃ kayirā jane sutā”ti. –
atk-s0517a:1817_0: Ettha arahattaṃ mānasanti vuttaṃ. Idha pana manova mānasaṃ. Byañjanavasena hetaṃ padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1818_2: hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmī”ti ettha uro hadayanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1818_3: “Hadayā hadayaṃ maññe aññāya tacchatī”ti ettha cittaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1818_11: Tato nikkhantattā pana akusalampi gaṅgāya nikkhantā nadī gaṅgā viya,
atk-s0517a:1818_12: godhāvarito nikkhantā godhāvarī viya ca “paṇḍara”ntveva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1818_13: Yasmā pana ārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇaṃ cittaṃ upakkilesena kileso na hoti,
atk-s0517a:1818_15: upakkilesayoge pana sati upakkiliṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0517a:1819_0: Mano manāyatananti idha pana manogahaṇaṃ manasseva āyatanabhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1819_3: atha kho mano eva āyatanaṃ manāyatana”nti.
atk-s0517a:1820_4: nāḷiyā minamāno viya mahātulāya dhārayamāno viya ca ārammaṇaṃ jānātīti mano,
atk-s0517a:1821_3: Rāsaṭṭhena hi viññāṇakkhandhassa ekadeso ekaṃ viññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1821_4: Tasmā yathā rukkhassa ekadesaṃ chindanto rukkhaṃ chindatīti vuccati,
atk-s0517a:1821_5: evameva viññāṇakkhandhassa ekadesabhūtaṃ ekampi viññāṇaṃ ruḷhito “viññāṇakkhandho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1821_6: Yasmā pana rāsaṭṭhoyeva khandhaṭṭho na hoti,
atk-s0517a:1821_9: Tajjā manoviññāṇadhātūti tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ anucchavikā manoviññāṇadhātu.
atk-s0517a:1821_10: Imasmiñhi pade ekameva cittaṃ minanaṭṭhena mano,
atk-s0517a:1821_13: nissattaṭṭhena vā dhātūti tīhi nāmehi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1824_3: Apica sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇamhi sampiṇḍetvā tiṭṭhatīti saṇṭhiti.
atk-s0517a:1824_5: Kusalapakkhasmiṃ hi cattāro dhammā ārammaṇaṃ ogāhanti saddhā sati samādhi paññāti.
atk-s0517a:1824_10: Akusalapakkhe pana tayo dhammā ārammaṇaṃ ogāhanti taṇhā diṭṭhi avijjāti.
atk-s0517a:1824_15: ayaṃ pana tathā na hotīti avikkhepo.
atk-s0517a:1824_18: ayaṃ pana avisāhaṭassa mānasassa bhāvoti avisāhaṭamānasatā.
atk-s0517a:1825_0: Samathoti tividho samatho cittasamatho adhikaraṇasamatho sabbasaṅkhārasamathoti.
atk-s0517a:1825_1: Tattha aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu cittekaggatā cittasamatho nāma.
atk-s0517a:1825_2: Tañhi āgamma cittacalanaṃ cittavipphandanaṃ sammati vūpasammati,
atk-s0517a:1825_5: Tañhi āgamma tāni tāni adhikaraṇāni sammanti vūpasammanti,
atk-s0517a:1825_7: Yasmā pana sabbe saṅkhārā nibbānaṃ āgamma sammanti vūpasammanti,
atk-s0517a:1826_1: Rāgato vimocayaṃ cittantiādīhi dasahi kilesavatthūhi vimocanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1826_3: uddhaccaggahaṇeneva ca kukkuccaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ hotīti aññesu pāṭhesu sahacārittā kilesavatthuto vimocanavacaneneva
atk-s0517a:1826_5: aniccānupassanādīhi niccasaññādito ca vimocanaṃ vuttameva hotīti.
atk-s0517a:1826_6: Kathaṃ taṃ cittaṃ anupassatīti ettha peyyāle ca aniccānupassanādīhi niccasaññādīnaṃ pahānaṃ vuttameva.
atk-s0517a:1828_1: Catutthacatukkaniddese “aniddiṭṭhe napuṃsaka”nti vacanato asukanti aniddiṭṭhattā “aniccanti kiṃ anicca”nti napuṃsakavacanena pucchā katā.
atk-s0517a:1828_6: Etena hutvā abhāvena aniccāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1828_7: Teneva ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saṅkhatalakkhaṇavasena aniccatāti tesaṃyeva uppādavayaññathatta”nti ca vatvāpi “hutvā abhāvo vā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1828_8: Etena hutvā abhāvākāro aniccalakkhaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1828_9: “Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ passanto imāni paññāya lakkhaṇānī”ti peyyālaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1829_0: Virāgānupassīniddese rūpe ādīnavaṃ disvāti bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya parato vuttehi aniccaṭṭhādīhi rūpakkhandhe ādīnavaṃ disvā.
atk-s0517a:1829_2: Nibbānañhi āgamma rūpaṃ virajjati apunaruppattidhammataṃ āpajjanena nirujjhati,
atk-s0517a:1829_5: Saddhādhimuttoti tasmiṃyeva nibbāne saddhāya ca adhimutto nicchito.
atk-s0517a:1829_6: Cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitanti assa yogissa cittaṃ khayavirāgasaṅkhāte rūpabhaṅge ārammaṇavasena,
atk-s0517a:1829_7: accanta virāgasaṅkhāte rūpavirāge nibbāne anussavavasena suṭṭhu adhiṭṭhitaṃ suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitaṃ hotīti sambandhato veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1829_8: Rūpe virāgānupassīti rūpassa khayavirāgo rūpe virāgoti pakatibhummavacanena vutto.
atk-s0517a:1829_9: Rūpassa accantavirāgo rūpe virāgoti nimittatthe bhummavacanena vutto.
atk-s0517a:1829_10: Taṃ duvidhampi virāgaṃ ārammaṇato ajjhāsayato ca anupassanasīlo “rūpe virāgānupassī”ti vutto.
atk-s0517a:1830_2: tattha avijjādīnaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānaṃ ādīnavanirodhadassaneneva rūpādīnampi ādīnavanirodhā dassitā honti tesampi paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānativattanato.
atk-s0517a:1830_3: Iminā eva ca visesavacanena virāgānupassanato nirodhānupassanāya visiṭṭhabhāvo vutto hoti.
atk-s0517a:1830_15: Mūlapaccayo hi byādhissa asappāyabhojanaṃ viya nidānanti vutto,
atk-s0517a:1830_16: āsannapaccayo byādhissa vātapittasemhā viya samudayoti vutto.
atk-s0517a:1830_18: samudayo pana suṭṭhu udeti etasmā phalamiti samudayo.
atk-s0517a:1830_21: Jātiyeva hi pabhavati etasmā dukkhanti pabhavoti vattuṃ yujjati.
atk-s0517a:1830_24: Mūlapaccayopi hi āsannapaccayo ca janakapaccayo upatthambhakapaccayo ca hotiyeva.
atk-s0517a:1830_27: Ñāṇuppādenāti tikkhavipassanāñāṇassa vā maggañāṇassa vā uppādena.
atk-s0517a:1830_28: Nirodhupaṭṭhānenāti vipassanākkhaṇe paccakkhato khayanirodhassa anussavavasena nirodhasaṅkhātassa nibbānassa upaṭṭhānena,
atk-s0517a:1831_1: Paṭinissaggānupassīpadaniddese rūpaṃ pariccajatīti ādīnavadassanena nirapekkhatāya rūpakkhandhaṃ pariccajati.
atk-s0517a:1831_5: Ettha ca vuṭṭhānagāminī vipassanā kilese tadaṅgavasena pariccajati,
atk-s0517a:1831_7: Rūpanirodhe nibbāne cittaṃ pakkhandatīti vuṭṭhānagāminī taṃninnatāya pakkhandati,
atk-s0517a:1831_13: Imasmiṃ catukke jarāmaraṇe vattabbaṃheṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1831_15: citte cittānupassanā”ti kāyacittānaṃ ekattavohāravasena ekavacananiddeso kato.
atk-s0517a:1831_17: dhammesu dhammānupassanā”ti vedanādhammānaṃ nānattavohāravasena bahuvacananiddeso katoti veditabboti.
atk-s0517a:1835_1: Idāni chahi rāsīhi uddiṭṭhañāṇesu catuvīsatisamādhiñāṇaniddese tāva kāyānupassanādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ catukkānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1835_2: vasena dvādasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ ekekasmiṃ assāsavasena eko,
atk-s0517a:1835_3: passāsavasena ekoti dve dve samādhīti dvādasasu vatthūsu catuvīsati samādhayo honti.
atk-s0517a:1836_2: Dīghaṃ assāsahetu jhānaṃ paṭilabhitvā samāhitena cittena vipassanākkhaṇe aniccato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1836_4: Tesaṃyeva dvādasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ ekekasmiṃ assāsavasena tisso,
atk-s0517a:1836_5: passāsavasena tissoti cha cha anupassanāti dvādasasu vatthūsu dvāsattati anupassanā honti.
atk-s0517a:1836_6: Tā eva dvāsattati anupassanā dvāsattativipassanāvasena ñāṇāni.
atk-s0517a:1837_0: Nibbidāñāṇaniddese aniccānupassī assasanti aniccānupassī hutvā assasanto,
atk-s0517a:1837_3: Yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passatīti nibbidāñāṇanti kalāpasammasanato paṭṭhāya yāva bhaṅgānupassanā pavattavipassanāñāṇena saṅkhārānaṃ yathāsabhāvaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0517a:1837_4: cakkhunā diṭṭhamiva ca teneva ñāṇacakkhunā passati.
atk-s0517a:1837_7: Upari bhayatūpaṭṭhānādīnaṃ muñcitukamyatādīnañca ñāṇānaṃ visuṃ āgatattā idha yathāvuttāneva vipassanāñāṇāni nibbidāñāṇānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0517a:1838_2: Bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññātivacaneneva bhayatupaṭṭhānaādīnavānupassanānibbidānupassanāñāṇāni vuttāni honti tiṇṇaṃ ekalakkhaṇattā.
atk-s0517a:1838_3: Imāni tīṇi ñāṇāni anantarā vuttānaṃ nibbidāñāṇānaṃ anukūlabhāvena anulomato nibbidānulomañāṇānīti vuttāni.
atk-s0517a:1839_1: Paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññātivacaneneva muñcitukamyatāpaṭisaṅkhānupassanāsaṅkhārupekkhāñāṇāni vuttāni honti tiṇṇaṃ ekalakkhaṇattā.

atk-s0517a:1898_16: Ekattupaṭṭhānanti ekārammaṇe acalabhāvena bhusaṃ ṭhānaṃ uparūpari saddhindriyassa paccayo hoti.
