atk-s0517a:1900_1: Assādaniddese assaddhiyassa anupaṭṭhānanti assaddhe puggale parivajjayato saddhe puggale sevato pasādanīyasuttante
atk-s0517a:1900_2: paccavekkhato tattha yonisomanasikāraṃ bahulīkaroto ca assaddhiyassa anupaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1900_3: Assaddhiyapariḷāhassa anupaṭṭhānanti ettha assaddhassa saddhākathāya pavattamānāya dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:1900_5: Adhimokkhacariyāya vesārajjanti saddhāvatthuvasena vā bhāvanāya vā vasippattassa saddhāpavattiyā visāradabhāvo hoti.
atk-s0517a:1900_6: Santo ca vihārādhigamoti samathassa vā vipassanāya vā paṭilābho.
atk-s0517a:1900_9: Sukhasomanassassa padhānassādattā “ayaṃ saddhindriyassa assādo”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1902_2: So aniccaṭṭho saddhindriyassa ādīnavoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1904_1: Nissaraṇaniddese adhimokkhaṭṭhenātiādīsu ekekasmiṃ indriye pañca pañca katvā pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ pañcavīsati
atk-s0517a:1904_3: Tattha tato paṇītatarasaddhindriyassa paṭilābhāti tato vipassanākkhaṇe pavattasaddhindriyato maggakkhaṇe
atk-s0517a:1904_5: Purimatarasaddhindriyā nissaṭaṃ hotīti tasmiṃ maggakkhaṇe saddhindriyaṃ purimatarato vipassanākkhaṇe pavattasaddhindriyato nikkhantaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1904_6: Imināva nayena phalakkhaṇe saddhindriyampi ubhayattha sesindriyānipi yojetabbāni.
atk-s0517a:1905_1: Pubbabhāge pañcahi indriyehīti paṭhamajjhānūpacāre pañcahi indriyehi paṭhamajjhānādiaṭṭhasamāpattivasena aṭṭha nissaraṇāni,
atk-s0517a:1905_5: Nekkhamme pañcindriyānītiādīni pana sattatiṃsa nissaraṇāni paṭipakkhapahānavasena paṭipakkhato niddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:1905_6: Tattha nekkhammādīsu sattasu satta nissaraṇāni upacārabhūmivasena vuttāni,
atk-s0517a:1906_1: Diṭṭhekaṭṭhehīti yāva sotāpattimaggā diṭṭhiyā saha ekasmiṃ puggale ṭhitāti diṭṭhekaṭṭhā.
atk-s0517a:1906_6: Tesu hi pahīnesu sabbakilesā pahīnā honti,
atk-s0517a:1906_9: Sabbesaññeva khīṇāsavānaṃ tattha tattha pañcindriyānīti “adhimokkhaṭṭhenā”tiādīsu pubbe vuttesu ṭhānesu
atk-s0517a:1906_10: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne pañcindriyāni buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ yathāyogaṃ tato tato nissaṭāni honti.
atk-s0517a:1906_11: Imasmiṃ vāre paṭhamaṃ vuttanayā eva yathāyogaṃ khīṇāsavavasena vuttā.
atk-s0517a:1907_0: Kathaṃ panetāni nissaraṇāni asītisataṃ hontīti? Vuccate –
atk-s0517a:1907_3: paṭipakkhavasena vuttāni sattatiṃsāti paṭhamavāre sabbāni channavuti nissaraṇāni honti,
atk-s0517a:1907_4: etāniyeva dutiyavāre khīṇāsavānaṃ vasena dvādasasu apanītesu caturāsīti honti.
atk-s0517a:1907_8: Samatikkamato vuttesu maggaphalavasena vuttāni aṭṭha nissaraṇāni,
atk-s0517a:1907_9: paṭipakkhato vuttesu maggavasena vuttāni cattārīti imāni dvādasa apanetabbāni.
atk-s0517a:1907_11: Sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttānaṃ pañcavīsatiyā nissaraṇānaṃ maggaphalavaseneva labbhanato.
atk-s0517a:1907_13: Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ pana phalasamāpattiṃ uparimā uparimā na samāpajjantiyevāti heṭṭhā tīṇipi phalāni na labbhantiyeva.
atk-s0517a:1907_15: Pañcapi cetāni indriyāni pubbameva paṭipakkhānaṃ paṭippassaddhattā paṭipakkhato nissaṭāneva hontīti.
atk-s0517a:1910_1: Puna aññaṃ suttantaṃ nikkhipitvā indriyavidhānaṃ niddisitukāmo pañcimāni,
atk-s0517a:1910_3: Tattha sotāpattiyaṅgesūti ettha soto ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
atk-s0517a:1910_13: Idañca imesaṃ indriyānaṃ sakavisaye jeṭṭhakabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1910_14: Yathā hi cattāro seṭṭhiputtā rājātirājapañcamesu sahāyesu “nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti vīthiṃ otiṇṇesu ekassa
atk-s0517a:1910_15: seṭṭhiputtassa gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0517a:1910_18: dutiyassa tatiyassa catutthassa gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0517a:1910_21: atha sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ gatakāle kiñcāpi rājā sabbattha issarova,
atk-s0517a:1910_22: imasmiṃ pana kāle attano geheyeva “imesaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ detha,
atk-s0517a:1910_24: evameva saddhāpañcamakesu indriyesu tesu sahāyesu ekato vīthiṃ otarantesu viya ekārammaṇe uppajjamānesupi
atk-s0517a:1910_25: yathā paṭhamassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0517a:1910_27: evaṃ sotāpattiaṅgāni patvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ saddhindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1910_29: Yathā dutiyassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0517a:1910_31: evaṃ sammappadhānāni patvā paggahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ vīriyindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1910_33: Yathā tatiyassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0517a:1910_35: evaṃ satipaṭṭhānāni patvā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ satindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1910_37: Yathā catutthassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0517a:1910_39: evaṃ jhānāni patvā avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ samādhindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1910_41: Sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ gatakāle pana yathā itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0517a:1910_43: evaṃ ariyasaccāni patvā pajānanalakkhaṇaṃ paññindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1912_1: Suttantassa pabhedagaṇanāpucchāpubbaṅgameva pabhedagaṇananiddese sappurisasaṃseveti sobhanānaṃ purisānaṃ sammā sevane.
atk-s0517a:1912_8: Dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyāti ettha nava lokuttaradhamme anugato dhammo dhammānudhammo,
atk-s0517a:1914_3: cariyāvāro uppannānaṃ āsevanakālavasena ca pāripūrikālavasena ca vutto.
atk-s0517a:1914_4: Cariyā pakati ussannatāti hi atthato ekaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1916_1: Idāni cariyāsambandheneva cāravihāraniddesavasena aparena pariyāyena indriyavidhānaṃ niddisitukāmo cāro
atk-s0517a:1916_2: ca vihāro cātiādikaṃ uddesaṃ uddisitvā tassa niddesamāha.
atk-s0517a:1916_3: Tattha uddese tāva yathā carantaṃ viharantaṃ viññū sabrahmacārī gambhīresu ṭhānesu okappeyyuṃ –
atk-s0517a:1916_4: addhā ayamāyasmā patto vā pāpuṇissati vāti,
atk-s0517a:1916_5: tathā indriyasampannassa cāro ca vihāro ca viññūhi sabrahmacārīhi anubuddho hoti paṭividdhoti uddesassa sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1916_15: Sattalokassa diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikā atthā lokatthāti ayaṃ viseso.
atk-s0517a:1917_0: Idāni tāsaṃ cariyānaṃ bhūmiṃ dassento catūsu iriyāpathesūtiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1917_2: Satipaṭṭhānesupi vuccamānesu satito anaññāni vohāravasena aññāni viya katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1917_3: Ariyasaccesūti pubbabhāgalokiyasaccañāṇena visuṃ visuṃ saccapariggahavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1917_6: Nippadesato hi lokatthacariyaṃ buddhā eva karonti.
atk-s0517a:1917_7: Puna tā eva cariyāyo kārakapuggalavasena dassento paṇidhisampannānantiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1917_8: Tattha paṇidhisampannā nāma iriyāpathānaṃ santattā iriyāpathaguttiyā sampannā akampitairiyāpathā bhikkhubhāvānurūpena santena iriyāpathena sampannā.
atk-s0517a:1917_9: Indriyesu guttadvārānanti cakkhādīsu chasu indriyesu attano attano visaye pavattaekekadvāravasena guttaṃ dvāraṃ etesanti guttadvārā.
atk-s0517a:1917_14: Buddhisampannānanti nāmarūpavavatthānaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva gotrabhu,
atk-s0517a:1918_9: Kusalā dhammā āyāpentīti samathavipassanāvasena pavattā kusalā dhammā bhusaṃ yāpenti,
atk-s0517a:1919_3: Yasmā adhimokkhaṭṭhādīsu anubuddhesu paṭividdhesu ca cāro ca vihāro ca anubuddho hoti paṭividdho,
atk-s0517a:1920_0: Evaṃ saddhāya carantantiādīsu evanti vuttappakāraṃ niddisanto yathāsaddassa atthaṃ niddisati.
atk-s0517a:1920_2: Viññātaṃ sabhāvaṃ vibhāventi pākaṭaṃ karontīti vibhāvī.
atk-s0517a:1920_3: Asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā,
atk-s0517a:1920_8: Saha brahmaṃ cariyaṃ uttamaṃ paṭipadaṃ carantīti sabrahmacārino.
atk-s0517a:1920_9: Apalokanakammādicatubbidhaṃ kammaṃ ekato karaṇavasena ekaṃ kammaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1920_14: Yesaṃ ekaṃ kammaṃ eko uddeso samasikkhatā,
atk-s0517a:1920_17: Vimokkhāti tayo vā aṭṭha vā vimokkhā.
atk-s0517a:1921_7: Ekasmiṃyeva anicchayatā hutvā itarampi kaṅkhatīti kaṅkhā,
atk-s0517a:1921_15: Apaṇṇakassa aviraddhassa niyyānikassa atthassa vacanaṃ apaṇṇakavacanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1921_22: Patissayanaṃ patissayo paraṃ garuṃ katvā nissayanaṃ apassayananti attho.
atk-s0517a:1924_1: Puna paṭhamasuttameva nikkhipitvā aparena ākārena indriyāni niddisati.
atk-s0517a:1924_2: Tattha katihākārehi kenaṭṭhena daṭṭhabbānīti katihi ākārehi daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-s0517a:1924_3: Kenaṭṭhena daṭṭhabbānīti daṭṭhabbākāre ca daṭṭhabbaṭṭhañca pucchati.
atk-s0517a:1924_4: Chahākārehi tenaṭṭhena daṭṭhabbānīti chahi ākārehi daṭṭhabbāni,
atk-s0517a:1924_7: Ādivisodhanaṭṭhenāti kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ādibhūtassa sīlassa visodhanaṭṭhena.
atk-s0517a:1924_9: Balavañhi adhikā mattā pamāṇaṃ assāti adhimattanti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1926_1: Ādhipateyyaṭṭhaniddese assaddhiyaṃ pajahatotiādi ekekasseva indriyassa paṭipakkhapajahanavacanaṃ ekakkhaṇepi
atk-s0517a:1926_4: Nānākkhaṇesu vā ekekaṃ indriyaṃ dhuraṃ katvā tassa tassa paṭipakkhassa taṃ taṃ indriyaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā
atk-s0517a:1928_1: Ādivisodhanaṭṭhaniddese assaddhiyasaṃvaraṭṭhena sīlavisuddhīti assaddhiyassa nivāraṇaṭṭhena viratiatthena sīlamalavisodhanato sīlavisuddhi nāma.
atk-s0517a:1928_2: Saddhindriyassa ādivisodhanāti saddhindriyassa upanissayavasena ādibhūtassa sīlassa visodhanā.
atk-s0517a:1928_3: Imināva nayena sesānipi kāmacchandādisaṃvaraṇamūlakāni ca indriyāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0517a:1930_1: Adhimattaṭṭhaniddese saddhindriyassa bhāvanāya chando uppajjatīti saddhassa puggalassa saddhāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0517a:1930_2: dhammaṃ sutvā vā saddhindriyabhāvanāya assādaṃ disvā vā saddhindriye kusalo dhammacchando jāyati.
atk-s0517a:1930_5: Passaddhi uppajjatīti pītiyā pīṇitattā kāyacittapassaddhi uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:1930_6: Sukhaṃ uppajjatīti passaddhakāyacittattā cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:1930_7: Obhāso uppajjatīti sukhena abhisannattā ñāṇobhāso uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:1930_8: Saṃvego uppajjatīti ñāṇobhāsena viditasaṅkhārādīnavattā saṅkhārapavattiyaṃ saṃvego uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:1930_9: Saṃvejetvā cittaṃ samādahatīti saṃvegaṃ uppādetvā teneva saṃvegena cittaṃ samāhitaṃ karoti.
atk-s0517a:1930_10: Sādhukaṃ paggaṇhātīti līnuddhatabhāvaṃ mocetvā suṭṭhu paggaṇhāti.
atk-s0517a:1930_11: Sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhatīti vīriyassa samaṃ hutvā pavattattā puna vīriyasamatāniyojane byāpāraṃ akaronto
atk-s0517a:1931_3: Tato paṇītatare vivaṭṭantīti tena kāraṇena vipassanārammaṇato paṇītatare nibbānārammaṇe vivaṭṭanānupassanāsaṅkhātena
atk-s0517a:1931_7: Vivaṭṭitattā tato vosajjatīti maggasamaṅgipuggalo maggassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva dubhatovuṭṭhānavasena vivaṭṭitattā
atk-s0517a:1931_8: teneva kāraṇena kilese ca khandhe ca vosajjati.
atk-s0517a:1931_9: Vosajjitattā tato nirujjhantīti maggassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva kilese ca khandhe ca vosajjitattā teneva kāraṇena
atk-s0517a:1931_10: kilesā ca khandhā ca anuppattinirodhavasena nirujjhanti.
atk-s0517a:1931_12: Kilesanirodhe sati khandhanirodhasabbhāvato ca khandhanirodho vutto.
atk-s0517a:1931_14: Tasseva maggassa uppādakkhaṇe dve vosagge dassetukāmo nirodhavasena dve vosaggātiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1931_16: Assaddhiyassa pahānāya chando uppajjatītiādīsupi imināva nayena vitthārato attho veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1933_2: Patiṭṭhāpakaṭṭhaniddese saddho saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhe patiṭṭhāpetīti saddhāsampanno “sabbe saṅkhārā
atk-s0517a:1933_3: aniccā dukkhā anattā”ti adhimuccanto saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhe patiṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0517a:1933_5: Saddhassa saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhe patiṭṭhāpetīti saddhāsampannassa puggalassa saddhindriyaṃ taṃyeva saddhaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0517a:1933_11: aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti passanto dassane patiṭṭhāpetīti sesesupi yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1936_1: Idāni samādhiṃ bhāvayato vipassanaṃ bhāvayato ca indriyasamodhānaṃ dassetukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva upaṭṭhānakosallappabhedaṃ
atk-s0517a:1936_3: Tattha puthujjano samādhiṃ bhāventoti nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvento.
atk-s0517a:1936_4: Sekkhassa vītarāgassa ca pana lokuttaropi samādhi labbhati.
atk-s0517a:1936_6: kasiṇādiparikammaṃ katvā tattha uppāditanimittattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1936_7: Ārammaṇūpaṭṭhānakusaloti tassa uppāditassa nimittasseva upaṭṭhāne kusalo.
atk-s0517a:1936_12: Avikkhepūpaṭṭhānakusaloti anuddhatālīnacittassa sampayuttassa samādhissa upaṭṭhāne kusalo.
atk-s0517a:1936_13: Obhāsūpaṭṭhānakusaloti paññāpayogamandatāya nirassāde citte aṭṭhasaṃvegavatthupaccavekkhaṇena cittaṃ saṃvejetvā ñāṇobhāsassa upaṭṭhāne kusalo.
atk-s0517a:1936_21: Upekkhūpaṭṭhānakusaloti uddhatādidosavirahite citte niggahapaggahādīsu byāpārābhāvakaraṇena upekkhāya upaṭṭhāne kusalo.
atk-s0517a:1936_23: Ekattūpaṭṭhānakusaloti sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ pahīnattā nekkhammādino ekattassa upaṭṭhāne kusalo.
atk-s0517a:1937_1: Ñāṇūpaṭṭhānakusaloti arahā dhammesu vigatasammohattā tattha tattha asammohañāṇassa upaṭṭhāne kusalo.
atk-s0517a:1937_3: Vimuttīti hi sabbakilesehi vimuttattā arahattaphalavimutti adhippetā.
atk-s0517a:1938_1: Vipassanābhāvanāya upaṭṭhānānupaṭṭhānesu aniccatotiādīni niccatotiādīni ca sīlakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-s0517a:1938_3: appaṇihitūpaṭṭhānakusalo paṇidhianupaṭṭhānakusalo abhinivesānupaṭṭhānakusalo”ti etesu sāmivacanena samāsapadacchedo kātabbo.
atk-s0517a:1939_1: Suññatūpaṭṭhānakusaloti panettha suññato upaṭṭhānakusaloti vā suññatāya upaṭṭhānakusaloti vā padacchedo kātabbo.
atk-s0517a:1939_3: paṭisaṅkhānupassanā vivaṭṭanānupassanāti imā aṭṭha mahāvipassanā attano sabhāvavisesena visesitā,
atk-s0517a:1939_5: tasmā imāsaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ “aniccato upaṭṭhānakusalo hotī”tiādīni vacanāni viya “nibbidāto upaṭṭhānakusalo hotī”tiādīni vacanāni na yujjanti.
atk-s0517a:1939_6: Tasmā eva imā aṭṭha na yojitā.
atk-s0517a:1939_8: abhinivesānupaṭṭhānakusalo hotī”ti iminā yugalakavacaneneva atthato “ādīnavato upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti,
atk-s0517a:1939_9: ālayābhinivesānupaṭṭhānakusalo hotī”ti yojitāva hotīti sarūpena na yojitā.
atk-s0517a:1939_11: ayañca ādīnavānupassanāti aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu imā nava ayojetvā itarā eva nava yojitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1939_12: Ñāṇūpaṭṭhānakusaloti sekkho vipassanūpakkilesānaṃ abhāvato vipassanābhāvanāya ñāṇassa upaṭṭhāne kusalo.
atk-s0517a:1939_13: Samādhibhāvanāya pana nikantisabbhāvato ñāṇūpaṭṭhāne kusaloti na vutto.
atk-s0517a:1940_2: Saññogānupaṭṭhānakusaloti kāmayogabhavayogadiṭṭhiyogāvijjāyogavasena catudhā vuttassa saññogassa anupaṭṭhāne kusalo.
atk-s0517a:1940_5: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno nibbānaninnaṃ cittaṃ hoti nibbānapoṇaṃ nibbānapabbhāraṃ vivekaṭṭhaṃ nekkhammābhirataṃ
atk-s0517a:1940_6: byantībhūtaṃ sabbaso āsavaṭṭhāniyehi dhammehī”ti vuttakhīṇāsavabalavasena nibbānaninnacittattā khīṇāsavova
atk-s0517a:1941_1: Ñāṇampi hi kusalapuggalayogato kusalaṃ yathā paṇḍitapuggalayogato “paṇḍitā dhammā”ti.
atk-s0517a:1942_1: Idāni catusaṭṭhiyā ākārehītiādi ñāṇakathāyaṃ vuttampi indriyakathāsambandhena idhānetvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1943_1: Puna samantacakkhusambandhena indriyavidhānaṃ vattukāmo na tassa addiṭṭhamidhatthi kiñcītiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1943_3: Paññindriyassa vasenātiādinā pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ aviyogitaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0517a:1943_4: Saddahanto paggaṇhātītiādīhi ekekindriyamūlakehi pañcahi catukkehi pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ ninnapayogakāle
atk-s0517a:1943_5: vā maggakkhaṇe vā ekarasabhāvaṃ aññamaññapaccayabhāvañca dasseti.
atk-s0517a:1943_6: Saddahitattā paggahitantiādīhi ekekindriyamūlakehi pañcahi catukkehi pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ nibbattikāle
atk-s0517a:1943_7: vā phalakāle vā ekarasabhāvaṃ aññamaññapaccayabhāvañca dasseti.
atk-s0517a:1943_8: Puna buddhacakkhusambandhena indriyavidhānaṃ vattukāmo yaṃ buddhacakkhūtiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1949_1: Idāni indriyakathānantaraṃ kathitāya vimokkhakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā anuppattā.
atk-s0517a:1949_2: Ayañhi vimokkhakathā indriyabhāvanānuyuttassa vimokkhasabbhāvato indriyakathānantaraṃ kathitā.
atk-s0517a:1949_3: Tañca kathento bhagavato sammukhā sutasuttantadesanāpubbaṅgamaṃ katvā kathesi.
atk-s0517a:1949_4: Tattha suttante tāva suññato vimokkhotiādīsu suññatākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto ariyamaggo suññato vimokkho.
atk-s0517a:1949_5: So hi suññatāya dhātuyā uppannattā suññato,
atk-s0517a:1949_7: Eteneva nayena animittākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto animitto,
atk-s0517a:1949_8: appaṇihitākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto appaṇihitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1950_0: Eko hi āditova aniccato saṅkhāre sammasati.
atk-s0517a:1950_1: Yasmā pana na aniccato sammasanamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1950_4: Tassa evaṃ paṭipannassa aniccato ce sammasanakāle maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1950_5: ayaṃ aniccato abhinivisitvā aniccato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0517a:1950_6: Sace panassa dukkhato anattato sammasanakāle maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1950_9: Esa nayo dukkhato anattato abhinivisitvā vuṭṭhānesupi.
atk-s0517a:1951_0: Apica maggo nāma pañcahi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati sarasena vā paccanīkena vā saguṇena vā ārammaṇena vā āgamanena vā.
atk-s0517a:1951_1: Sace hi saṅkhārupekkhā aniccato saṅkhāre sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0517a:1951_8: Aniccānupassanāya pana saṅkhārānaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā niccanimittadhuvanimittasassatanimittāni pahāya āgatattā animitto,
atk-s0517a:1951_9: dukkhānupassanāya sukhasaññaṃ pahāya paṇidhipatthanaṃ sukkhāpetvā āgatattā appaṇihito,
atk-s0517a:1951_10: anattānupassanāya attasattapuggalasaññaṃ pahāya saṅkhāre suññato diṭṭhattā suññatoti idaṃ paccanīkato nāmaṃ nāma.
atk-s0517a:1951_14: rāgapaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvato appaṇihitoti idamassa saguṇato nāmaṃ nāma.
atk-s0517a:1951_15: Soyaṃ suññaṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitañca nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotītipi suññato animitto appaṇihitoti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1951_25: Idaṃ pana nāmaṃ abhidhammapariyāye na labbhati,
atk-s0517a:1951_27: Tattha hi gotrabhuñāṇaṃ animittaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā animittanāmakaṃ hutvā sayaṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā maggassa nāmaṃ detīti vadanti.
atk-s0517a:1951_30: Dukkhānupassanā saṅkhāresu paṇidhiṃ sukkhāpetvā āgatattā appaṇihitā nāma,
atk-s0517a:1951_32: appaṇihitamaggassa phalaṃ appaṇihitanti evaṃ vipassanā attano nāmaṃ maggassa deti,
atk-s0517a:1951_33: maggo phalassāti idaṃ āgamanato nāmaṃ nāma.
atk-s0517a:1952_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā desite tayo mahāvatthuke vimokkhe uddisitvā taṃniddesavaseneva aparepi vimokkhe niddisitukāmo apica aṭṭhasaṭṭhi vimokkhātiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1952_5: Bhagavatā pana desite tayo vimokkhe ṭhapetvā aññavimokkhe niddisanato imesaṃ tadavarodhato ca ime tayo na gaṇetabbā,
atk-s0517a:1952_6: ajjhattavimokkhādayo tayopi vimokkhā catudhā vitthāravacaneyeva antogadhattā na gaṇetabbā,
atk-s0517a:1952_8: appaṇihito vimokkho”ti ettha appaṇihito vimokkho paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhena ekanāmikattā na gaṇetabbo,
atk-s0517a:1952_9: evaṃ imesu sattasu apanītesu sesā aṭṭhasaṭṭhi vimokkhā honti.
atk-s0517a:1952_10: Evaṃ sante suññatavimokkhādayo tayo puna kasmā uddiṭṭhāti ce?
atk-s0517a:1952_12: Ajjhattavuṭṭhānādayo pana tayo pabhedaṃ vinā mūlarāsivasena uddiṭṭhā,
atk-s0517a:1952_13: paṇihitavimokkhapaṭipakkhavasena puna appaṇihito vimokkho uddiṭṭhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1953_3: Rūpīti ajjhattaṃ kesādīsu uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1953_4: taṃ rūpamassa atthīti rūpī rūpāni passatīti bahiddhā nīlakasiṇādirūpāni jhānacakkhunā passati.
atk-s0517a:1953_8: Iminā bahiddhā parikammaṃ katvā bahiddhāva paṭiladdhajjhānatā dassitā.
atk-s0517a:1953_11: yo pana appaṭikūlākārena sattārammaṇaṃ pharanto viharati,
atk-s0517a:1953_15: Soyeva sakiccakaraṇavasena appitasamaye eva niyuttoti sāmayiko.
atk-s0517a:1953_23: Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena sampayogavasena ca natthettha āsavāti anāsavo.
atk-s0517a:1953_25: Sabbaso rūpārūpappahānā nirāmisatopi nirāmisataroti nirāmisā nirāmisataro.
atk-s0517a:1953_30: Tadeva vipassanāñāṇaṃ sammohato vimuccanavasena ñāṇameva vimokkhoti ñāṇavimokkho.
atk-s0517a:1953_31: Sītisiyāvimokkhoti vipassanāñāṇameva sīti bhaveyyāti pavatto vimokkho sītisiyāvimokkho.
atk-s0517a:1953_35: Anupādā cittassa vimokkhoti anupādiyitvā gahaṇaṃ akatvā cittassa vimokkho.
atk-s0517a:1956_1: Katamotiādike uddesassa niddese iti paṭisañcikkhatīti evaṃ upaparikkhati.
atk-s0517a:1956_5: Tattha attena vāti bālajanaparikappitassa attano abhāvā tena attanā ca suññaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1956_6: Attaniyena vāti tassa parikappitassa attano santakena ca suññaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1956_8: Attaniyañca nāma niccaṃ vā siyā sukhaṃ vā,
atk-s0517a:1956_13: Soti so evaṃ tīhi anupassanāhi vipassamāno bhikkhu.
atk-s0517a:1956_14: Abhinivesaṃ na karotīti anattānupassanāvasena attābhinivesaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0517a:1957_0: Nimittaṃ na karotīti aniccānupassanāvasena niccanimittaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0517a:1957_1: Paṇidhiṃ na karotīti dukkhānupassanāvasena paṇidhiṃ na karoti.
atk-s0517a:1957_2: Ime tayo vimokkhā pariyāyena vipassanākkhaṇe tadaṅgavasenāpi labbhanti,
atk-s0517a:1957_4: Cattāri jhānāni ajjhattaṃ nīvaraṇādīhi vuṭṭhānato ajjhattavuṭṭhāno vimokkho.
atk-s0517a:1957_5: Catasso arūpasamāpattiyo ārammaṇehi vuṭṭhānato bahiddhāvuṭṭhāno vimokkho.
atk-s0517a:1957_6: Ārammaṇampi hi bāhirāyatanāni viya idha “bahiddhā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1958_1: Rūpasaññāyātiādīhi kasiṇādiārammaṇasamatikkamassa pākaṭattā taṃ avatvā suttantesu vuttarūpasaññādisamatikkamo vutto.
atk-s0517a:1959_1: Vitakko cātiādīhi jhānānaṃ samāpattīnañca upacārabhūmiyo vuttā.
atk-s0517a:1959_3: Paṭilābho vāti pañcavidhavasippattiyā byāpito patthaṭo lābhoti paṭilābho.
atk-s0517a:1959_4: Vasippattiyā hi sabbo jhānapayogo ca samāpattipayogo ca paṭippassaddho hoti,
atk-s0517a:1959_6: Vipāko pana jhānassa samāpattiyā ca paṭippassaddhi hotīti ujukameva.
atk-s0517a:1959_7: Keci pana “upacārapayogassa paṭippassaddhattā jhānassa samāpattiyā ca paṭilābho hoti,
atk-s0517a:1960_4: Nīlasaññaṃ paṭilabhatīti tasmiṃ nīlanimitte nīlamitisaññaṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0517a:1960_5: Suggahitaṃ karotīti parikammabhūmiyaṃ suṭṭhu uggahitaṃ karoti.
atk-s0517a:1960_6: Sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāretīti upacārabhūmiyaṃ suṭṭhu upadhāritaṃ katvā upadhāreti.
atk-s0517a:1960_7: Svāvatthitaṃ avatthāpetīti appanābhūmiyaṃ suṭṭhu nicchitaṃ nicchināti.
atk-s0517a:1960_9: Ajjhattañhi nīlaparikammaṃ karonto kese vā pitte vā akkhitārakāyaṃ vā karoti.
atk-s0517a:1960_19: Ajjhattaṃ pītanimittādīsu pītaparikammaṃ karonto mede vā chaviyā vā akkhīnaṃ pītaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-s0517a:1960_20: Lohitaparikammaṃ karonto maṃse vā lohite vā jivhāya vā hatthatalapādatalesu vā akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-s0517a:1960_21: Odātaparikammaṃ karonto aṭṭhimhi vā dante vā nakhe vā akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-s0517a:1960_22: Ajjhattaṃ arūpanti ajjhattaṃ rūpanimittaṃ natthīti attho.
atk-s0517a:1961_2: Ekaṃ disanti ekaṃ ekissā disāya paṭhamapariggahitaṃ sattaṃ upādāya ekadisāpariyāpannasattapharaṇavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1961_5: Tathā dutiyanti yathā puratthimādīsu yaṃkiñci ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati,
atk-s0517a:1961_6: tatheva tadanantaraṃ dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthaṃ vāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1961_7: Iti uddhanti eteneva nayena uparimaṃ disanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1961_8: Adho tiriyanti adhodisampi tiriyaṃ disampi evameva.
atk-s0517a:1961_11: Evaṃ sabbadisāsu assamaṇḍalikāya assamiva mettāsahagataṃ cittaṃ sāretipi paccāsāretipīti.
atk-s0517a:1961_12: Ettāvatā ekamekaṃ disaṃ pariggahetvā odhiso mettāpharaṇaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1961_16: “ayaṃ parasatto”ti vibhāgaṃ akatvā attasamatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1962_1: Yasmā vā ettha odhiso pharaṇe viya puna tathāsaddo vā iti-
atk-s0517a:1962_7: Tañhi kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatāya vipulaphalatāya dīghasantānatāya ca mahantabhāvaṃ gataṃ,
atk-s0517a:1962_8: mahantehi vā uḷāracchandavīriyacittapaññehi gataṃ paṭipannanti mahaggataṃ.
atk-s0517a:1962_13: Appaṭikūlā hontīti bhikkhuno cittassa appaṭikūlā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0517a:1963_3: Sabbampi hi akusalaṃ kilesapariḷāhayogato sabyāpajjamevāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
atk-s0517a:1964_5: Rūpāvacarajjhānampi hi rūpanti vuccati “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu,
atk-s0517a:1964_7: Tasmā idha rūpe saññā rūpasaññāti evaṃ saññāsīsena vuttarūpāvacarajjhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1964_10: Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ adhivacananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1964_14: etesañca pathavīkasiṇādivasena navannaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpasaññānaṃ sabbākārena,
atk-s0517a:1964_15: anavasesānaṃ vā virāgā ca nirodhā ca virāgahetu ceva nirodhahetu ca ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
atk-s0517a:1964_16: Na hi sakkā sabbaso anatikkantarūpasaññena etaṃ upasampajja viharitunti.
atk-s0517a:1964_17: Yasmā pana ārammaṇasamatikkamena pattabbā etā samāpattiyo,
atk-s0517a:1964_19: Ārammaṇe avirattassa ca saññāsamatikkamo na hoti,
atk-s0517a:1964_20: tasmā ayaṃ ārammaṇasamatikkamavasenāpi atthavaṇṇanā katāti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1965_0: Paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇānañca paṭighātena uppannā saññā paṭighasaññā,
atk-s0517a:1965_3: akusalavipākānaṃ pañcannanti sabbaso dasannampi paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā pahānā asamuppādā,
atk-s0517a:1965_6: na hi tasmiṃ samaye pañcadvāravasena cittaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0517a:1965_7: evaṃ santepi aññattha pahīnānaṃ sukhadukkhānaṃ catutthajjhāne viya sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ tatiyamagge viya
atk-s0517a:1965_8: ca imasmiṃ jhāne ussāhajananatthaṃ imassa jhānassa pasaṃsāvasena etāsaṃ ettha vacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1965_9: Atha vā kiñcāpi tā rūpāvacaraṃ samāpannassa na santi,
atk-s0517a:1965_10: atha kho na pahīnattā na santi.
atk-s0517a:1965_14: tasmā tā ettha pahīnāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0517a:1965_17: Tāsañhi ito pubbe appahīnattāyeva “paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannassa saddo kaṇṭako”ti vutto bhagavatā.
atk-s0517a:1965_18: Idha ca pahīnattāyeva arūpasamāpattīnaṃ āneñjatā santavimokkhatā ca vuttā.
atk-s0517a:1966_0: Nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārāti nānatte vā gocare pavattānaṃ saññānaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1966_2: Yasmā hetā rūpasaddādibhede nānatte nānāsabhāve gocare pavattanti,
atk-s0517a:1966_7: ekādasa kāmāvacarakiriyāsaññāti evaṃ catucattālīsampi saññā nānattā nānāsabhāvā aññamaññavisadisā,
atk-s0517a:1966_9: Tāsaṃ sabbaso nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā anāvajjanā citte ca anuppādanā.
atk-s0517a:1966_10: Yasmā tā nāvajjati citte ca na uppādeti na manasikaroti na paccavekkhati,
atk-s0517a:1966_12: Yasmā cettha purimā rūpasaññā paṭighasaññā ca iminā jhānena nibbatte bhavepi na vijjanti,
atk-s0517a:1966_13: pageva tasmiṃ bhave imaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇakāle,
atk-s0517a:1966_14: tasmā tāsaṃ samatikkamā atthaṅgamāti dvedhāpi abhāvoyeva vutto.
atk-s0517a:1966_17: dasākusalasaññāti imā sattavīsati saññā iminā jhānena nibbatte bhave vijjanti,
atk-s0517a:1966_19: Tatthāpi hi imaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharanto tāsaṃ amanasikārāyeva upasampajja viharati.
atk-s0517a:1966_21: Saṅkhepato cettha “rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā”tiiminā sabbarūpāvacaradhammānaṃ pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1966_22: “Paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā”tiiminā sabbesaṃ kāmāvacaracittacetasikānaṃ pahānañca amanasikāro ca vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1967_0: Ananto ākāsoti ettha paññattimattattā nāssa uppādanto vā vayanto vā paññāyatīti ananto,
atk-s0517a:1967_2: Na hi so yogī ekadesavasena pharati,
atk-s0517a:1967_6: Upasampajja viharatīti taṃ patvā nipphādetvā tadanurūpena iriyāpathena viharati.
atk-s0517a:1968_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti pubbe vuttanayena jhānampi ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ārammaṇampi.
atk-s0517a:1968_1: Ārammaṇampi hi pubbe vuttanayeneva ākāsānañcaṃ ca taṃ paṭhamassa āruppajjhānassa ārammaṇattā devānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1968_3: tathā ākāsānañcaṃ ca taṃ tassa jhānassa sañjātihetuttā “kambojā assānaṃ āyatana”ntiādīni viya sañjātidesaṭṭhena āyatanañcātipi ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1968_4: Evametaṃ jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇena ca samatikkamitvāva yasmā
atk-s0517a:1968_6: tasmā ubhayampetamekajjhaṃ katvā “ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammā”ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1968_7: Anantaṃ viññāṇanti taṃyeva “ananto ākāso”ti pharitvā pavattaṃ viññāṇaṃ “anantaṃ viññāṇa”nti manasikarontoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1968_9: So hi taṃ ākāsārammaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ anavasesato manasikaronto anantaṃ manasi karoti.
atk-s0517a:1969_0: Viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti etthāpi ca pubbe vuttanayeneva jhānampi viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ārammaṇampi.
atk-s0517a:1969_1: Ārammaṇampi hi pubbe vuttanayeneva viññāṇañcaṃ ca taṃ dutiyassa āruppajjhānassa ārammaṇattā adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanañcāti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1969_2: tathā viññāṇañcaṃ ca taṃ tasseva jhānassa sañjātihetuttā sañjātidesaṭṭhena āyatanañcātipi viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1969_3: Evametaṃ jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇena ca samatikkamitvāva yasmā
atk-s0517a:1969_5: tasmā ubhayampetamekajjhaṃ katvā “viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammā”ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1969_8: vivittaṃ vivittanti evaṃ manasikarontoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1970_0: Ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti etthāpi pubbe vuttanayeneva jhānampi ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ ārammaṇampi.
atk-s0517a:1970_1: Ārammaṇampi hi pubbe vuttanayeneva ākiñcaññañca taṃ tatiyassa āruppajjhānassa ārammaṇattā adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanañcāti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1970_2: tathā ākiñcaññañca taṃ tasseva jhānassa sañjātihetuttā sañjātidesaṭṭhena āyatanañcātipi ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1970_3: Evametaṃ jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇena ca samatikkamitvāva yasmā
atk-s0517a:1970_5: tasmā ubhayampetamekajjhaṃ katvā “ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkammā”ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1971_0: “Rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādikā satta vimokkhā paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuccanaṭṭhena ārammaṇe abhirativasena suṭṭhu muccanaṭṭhena ca vimokkhā,
atk-s0517a:1972_5: Ādittaṃ ayoguḷaṃ makkhikā viya tejussadaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ āsavā nālambantīti anāsavo.
atk-s0517a:1973_2: dasa hontīti ca eko hotīti ca bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1973_7: Siyāti kathañca siyāti yaṃ vā siyāti vihitaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1973_14: Esa nayo sukhato attato nimittato saññāyāti etthāpi.
atk-s0517a:1973_18: Esa nayo rāgato samudayato ādānato paṇidhito abhinivesato saññāyāti etthāpi.
atk-s0517a:1973_19: Yasmā pana khayavayavipariṇāmānupassanā tisso aniccānupassanādīnaṃ balavabhāvāya balavapaccayabhūtā bhaṅgānupassanāvisesā.
atk-s0517a:1973_21: Aniccānupassanāya ca balavatiyā jātāya “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1973_22: yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti dukkhānattānupassanāpi balavatiyo honti.
atk-s0517a:1973_23: Tasmā aniccānupassanādīsu vuttāsu tāpi tisso vuttāva honti.
atk-s0517a:1973_24: Yasmā ca suññatānupassanā “abhinivesato saññāya muccatī”ti vacaneneva sārādānābhinivesasammohābhinivesaālayābhinivesasaññogābhinivesato
atk-s0517a:1973_26: abhinivesābhāveneva appaṭisaṅkhāto saññāya muccatīti vuttameva hoti,
atk-s0517a:1973_27: tasmā adhipaññādhammavipassanādayo pañcapi anupassanā na vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1973_28: Evaṃ aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu etā aṭṭha anupassanā avatvā daseva anupassanā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1975_1: Aniccānupassanā anuttaraṃ sītibhāvañāṇanti ettha sāsaneyeva sabbhāvato uttamaṭṭhena anuttaraṃ,
atk-s0517a:1975_6: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo anuttaraṃ sītibhāvaṃ sacchikātu”nti ettha nibbānaṃ anuttaro sītibhāvo nāma.
atk-s0517a:1975_8: Niccato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti etthāpi “nicca”nti pavattakilesā eva idha cāmutra ca santāpanaṭṭhena santāpo,
atk-s0517a:1976_2: Nekkhammādīni cettha aṭṭha samāpattiyo ca nibbedhabhāgiyāneva.
atk-s0517a:1977_4: yadidaṃ anupādā cittassa vimokkho”ti ettha pana nibbānaṃ anupādā cittassa vimokkho.
atk-s0517a:1977_9: Upādānato muccanesu yasmā ādito saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayaṃ passitvā passitvā aniccānupassanāya vipassati,
atk-s0517a:1977_10: pacchā saṅkhārānaṃ bhaṅgameva passitvā animittānupassanāya vipassati.
atk-s0517a:1977_12: Saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayadassanena ca bhaṅgadassanena ca attābhāvo pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0517a:1977_13: Tena diṭṭhupādānassa ca attavādupādānassa ca pahānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1977_14: Diṭṭhippahāneneva ca “sīlabbatena attā sujjhatī”ti dassanassa abhāvato sīlabbatupādānassa pahānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1977_15: Yasmā ca anattānupassanāya ujukameva attābhāvaṃ passati,
atk-s0517a:1977_17: tasmā imāni cattāri ñāṇāni diṭṭhupādānādīhi tīhi upādānehi muccanti.
atk-s0517a:1977_18: Dukkhānupassanādīnaṃyeva pana catassannaṃ taṇhāya ujuvipaccanīkattā aniccānupassanādīnaṃ catassannaṃ kāmupādānato muccanaṃ na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1977_19: Yasmā ādito dukkhānupassanāya “saṅkhārā dukkhā”ti passato pacchā appaṇihitānupassanāya ca “saṅkhārā dukkhā”ti passato saṅkhārānaṃ patthanā pahīyati.
atk-s0517a:1977_21: Yasmā ca saṅkhāresu nibbidānupassanāya nibbindantassa virāgānupassanāya virajjantassa saṅkhārānaṃ patthanā pahīyati,
atk-s0517a:1977_22: tasmā imāni cattāri ñāṇāni kāmupādānato muccanti.
atk-s0517a:1977_25: tasmā imāni dve ñāṇāni catūhi upādānehi muccantīti evaṃ sabhāvanānattena ca ākāranānattena ca aṭṭhasaṭṭhi vimokkhā niddiṭṭhā.
atk-s0517a:1978_1: Idāni ādito uddiṭṭhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vimokkhānaṃ mukhāni dassetvā vimokkhamukhapubbaṅgamaṃ indriyavisesaṃ puggalavisesañca
atk-s0517a:1978_4: Lokaniyyānāya saṃvattantīti tedhātukalokato niyyānāya niggamanāya saṃvattanti.
atk-s0517a:1978_5: Sabbasaṅkhāre paricchedaparivaṭumato samanupassanatāyāti sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayavasena paricchedato ceva parivaṭumato ca samanupassanatāya.
atk-s0517a:1978_7: Aniccānupassanā hi udayato pubbe saṅkhārā natthīti paricchinditvā tesaṃ gatiṃ samannesamānā vayato paraṃ na gacchanti,
atk-s0517a:1978_11: Animittāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāyāti vipassanākkhaṇepi nibbānaninnatāya animittākārena upaṭṭhānato
atk-s0517a:1978_12: animittasaṅkhātāya nibbānadhātuyā cittapavisanatāya ca lokaniyyānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1978_15: Appaṇihitāya ca dhātuyāti vipassanākkhaṇepi nibbānaninnatāya appaṇihitākārena upaṭṭhānato appaṇihitasaṅkhātāya nibbānadhātuyā.
atk-s0517a:1978_16: Sabbadhammeti nibbānassa avipassanupagattepi anattasabhāvasabbhāvato “sabbasaṅkhāre”ti avatvā “sabbadhamme”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1978_17: Parato samanupassanatāyāti paccayāyattattā avasatāya avidheyyatāya ca “nāhaṃ na mama”nti evaṃ anattato samanupassanatāya.
atk-s0517a:1978_18: Suññatāya ca dhātuyāti vipassanākkhaṇepi nibbānaninnatāya suññatākārena upaṭṭhānato suññatāsaṅkhātāya nibbānadhātuyā.
atk-s0517a:1978_19: Iti imāni tīṇi vacanāni aniccadukkhānattānupassanānaṃ vasena vuttāni.
atk-s0517a:1979_0: Adhimokkhabahulanti aniccānupassanāya “khaṇabhaṅgavasena saṅkhārā bhijjantī”ti saddhāya paṭipannassa
atk-s0517a:1979_1: paccakkhato khaṇabhaṅgadassanena “saccaṃ vatāha bhagavā”ti bhagavati saddhāya saddhābahulaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1979_2: Atha vā paccuppannānaṃ padesasaṅkhārānaṃ aniccataṃ passitvā “evaṃ aniccā atītānāgatapaccuppannā sabbe
atk-s0517a:1979_4: Passaddhibahulanti dukkhānupassanāya cittakkhobhakarāya paṇidhiyā pajahanato cittadarathābhāvena passaddhibahulaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1979_5: Atha vā dukkhānupassanāya saṃvegajananato saṃviggassa ca yoniso padahanato vikkhepābhāvena passaddhibahulaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1979_6: Vedabahulanti anattānupassanāya bāhirakehi adiṭṭhaṃ gambhīraṃ anattalakkhaṇaṃ passato ñāṇabahulaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1979_7: Atha vā “sadevakena lokena adiṭṭhaṃ anattalakkhaṇaṃ diṭṭha”nti tuṭṭhassa tuṭṭhibahulaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1980_0: Adhimokkhabahulo saddhindriyaṃ paṭilabhatīti pubbabhāge adhimokkho bahulaṃ pavattamāno bhāvanāpāripūriyā saddhindriyaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0517a:1980_2: Passaddhibahulo samādhindriyaṃ paṭilabhatīti pubbabhāge passaddhibahulassa “passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti,
atk-s0517a:1980_3: sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti vacanato bhāvanāpāripūriyā passaddhipaccayā samādhindriyaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1980_5: Vedabahulo paññindriyaṃ paṭilabhatīti pubbabhāge vedo bahulaṃ pavattamāno bhāvanāpāripūriyā paññindriyaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0517a:1981_0: Ādhipateyyaṃ hotīti chandādike adhipatibhūtepi sakiccanipphādanavasena adhipati hoti padhāno hoti.
atk-s0517a:1981_3: Tadanvayā hontīti taṃ anugāminī taṃ anuvattinī honti.
atk-s0517a:1981_4: Sahajātapaccayā hontīti uppajjamānā ca sahauppādanabhāvena upakārakā honti pakāsassa padīpo viya.
atk-s0517a:1981_5: Aññamaññapaccayā hontīti aññamaññaṃ uppādanupatthambhanabhāvena upakārakā honti aññamaññūpatthambhakaṃ tidaṇḍaṃ viya.
atk-s0517a:1981_6: Nissayapaccayā hontīti adhiṭṭhānākārena nissayākārena ca upakārakā honti tarucittakammānaṃ pathavīpaṭādi viya.
atk-s0517a:1982_2: Paññindriyaṃ ādhipateyyaṃ hotīti maggakkhaṇe nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā saccadassanakiccakaraṇavasena ca
atk-s0517a:1982_8: bhāventopi paṭivijjhatīti maggakkhaṇe sakiṃyeva bhāvanāya ca paṭivedhassa ca sabbhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1982_9: Anattānupassanāya vipassanākkhaṇepi paññindriyasseva ādhipateyyattā “paṭivedhakālepī”ti apisaddo payutto.
atk-s0517a:1983_1: Aniccato manasikaroto katamindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotītiādi indriyavisesena puggalavisesaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1983_4: Saddhāvimuttoti ettha avisesetvā vuttepi upari visesetvā vuttattā sotāpattimaggaṃ ṭhapetvā sesesu sattasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimuttoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1983_6: na saddhindriyassa adhimattattā sabbattha saddhāvimuttotipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1983_7: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe saddhindriyassa adhimattattāyeva sesesu samādhindriyapaññindriyādhimattattepi sati saddhāvimuttoyeva nāma hotīti vadanti.
atk-s0517a:1983_8: Kāyasakkhī hotīti aṭṭhasupi ṭhānesu kāyasakkhī nāma hoti.
atk-s0517a:1984_0: Saddahanto vimuttoti saddhāvimuttoti saddhindriyassa adhimattattā sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe saddahanto catūsupi
atk-s0517a:1984_4: Phuṭṭhattā sacchikatoti kāyasakkhīti sukkhavipassakatte sati upacārajjhānaphassassa rūpārūpajjhānalābhitte
atk-s0517a:1984_5: sati rūpārūpajjhānaphassassa phuṭṭhattā nibbānaṃ sacchikatoti kāyasakkhī,
atk-s0517a:1984_6: nāmakāyena vuttappakāre jhānaphasse ca nibbāne ca sakkhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1984_7: Diṭṭhattā pattoti diṭṭhippattoti sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe sampayuttena paññindriyena paṭhamaṃ nibbānassa
atk-s0517a:1984_8: diṭṭhattā pacchā sotāpattiphalādivasena nibbānaṃ pattoti diṭṭhippatto,
atk-s0517a:1984_9: paññindriyasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā nibbānaṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1984_11: Saddahanto vimuccatīti saddhāvimuttoti saddhindriyassa adhimattattā sakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattamaggakkhaṇesu saddahanto vimuccatīti saddhāvimutto.
atk-s0517a:1984_14: “Jhānaphassa”ntiādīni “dukkhā saṅkhārā”tiādīni ca paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ dvayameva visesetvā vuttāni.
atk-s0517a:1984_16: Ettha ca jhānalābhī puggalo samādhindriyassa anukūlāya dukkhānupassanāya eva vuṭṭhahitvā maggaphalāni pāpuṇātīti ācariyānaṃ adhippāyo.
atk-s0517a:1985_3: Tayo puggalāti vipassanāniyamena indriyaniyamena ca vuttā tayo puggalā.
atk-s0517a:1985_7: Heṭṭhā ekekissā anupassanāya ekekassa indriyassa ādhipaccaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttanti ca,
atk-s0517a:1985_8: kadāci tīsupi anupassanāsu ekekasseva indriyassa ādhipaccaṃ hotīti ca dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1985_9: Atha vā pubbabhāgavipassanākkhaṇe tissannampi anupassanānaṃ sabbhāvato tāsu pubbabhāgavipassanāsu tesaṃ
atk-s0517a:1985_10: tesaṃ indriyānaṃ ādhipaccaṃ apekkhitvā maggaphalakkhaṇesu saddhāvimuttādīni nāmāni hontīti.
atk-s0517a:1985_11: Evañhi vuccamāne heṭṭhā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya upari ca kato indriyādhipaccapuggalaniyamo sukatoyeva niccaloyeva ca hoti.
atk-s0517a:1985_12: Anantaravāre siyāti aññoyevāti evaṃ siyāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1986_0: Idāni maggaphalavasena puggalavisesaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ aniccato manasikaroto…pe…
atk-s0517a:1986_3: saddhāya vā nibbānaṃ anussarati anugacchatīti saddhānusārī.
atk-s0517a:1986_7: tena vā dhammena nibbānaṃ anussaratīti dhammānusārī.
atk-s0517a:1987_1: Puna aparehi pariyāyehi indriyattayavisesena puggalavisesaṃ vaṇṇetukāmo ye hi kecītiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1987_2: Tattha bhāvitā vāti atīte bhāvayiṃsu vā.
atk-s0517a:1987_5: Adhigatā vātiādi ekekantikaṃ purimassa purimassa atthavivaraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1987_12: Aṭṭha vimokkheti “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādike paṭisambhidāmaggappattiyā eva pattā.
atk-s0517a:1988_0: Tisso sikkhāti adhisīlasikkhā adhicittasikkhā adhipaññāsikkhā maggappattā eva sikkhamānā.
atk-s0517a:1988_8: ubhatobhāgavimutto ca paññāvimutto cāti ime dve aniddiṭṭhā.
atk-s0517a:1988_9: Aññattha pana “yo pana dukkhato manasikaronto passaddhibahulo samādhindriyaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0517a:1988_11: arūpajjhānaṃ pana patvā aggaphalaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma hoti.
atk-s0517a:1988_12: Yo pana anattato manasikaronto vedabahulo paññindriyaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0517a:1988_17: Atthato pana arūpajjhānena ceva ariyamaggena cāti ubhatobhāgena vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto.
atk-s0517a:1989_1: Idāni vimokkhapubbaṅgamameva vimokkhavisesaṃ puggalavisesañca dassetukāmo aniccato manasikarototiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1989_3: Aniccānupassanāgamanavasena hi animittavimokkhoti laddhanāmo maggo rāgadosamohapaṇidhīnaṃ abhāvā saguṇato
atk-s0517a:1989_4: ca tesaṃyeva paṇidhīnaṃ abhāvā appaṇihitanti laddhanāmaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti ārammaṇato ca appaṇihitavimokkhoti
atk-s0517a:1989_6: Tathā rāgadosamohehi suññattā saguṇato ca rāgādīhiyeva suññattā suññatanti laddhanāmaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:1989_7: karotīti ārammaṇato ca suññatavimokkhoti nāmampi labhati.
atk-s0517a:1989_8: Tasmā te dve vimokkhā animittavimokkhanvayā nāma honti.
atk-s0517a:1989_9: Animittamaggato anaññepi aṭṭhannaṃ maggaṅgānaṃ ekekassa maggaṅgassa vasena sahajātādipaccayā ca hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1989_11: Dukkhānupassanāgamanavasena hi appaṇihitavimokkhoti laddhanāmo maggo rūpanimittādīnaṃ rāganimittādīnaṃ
atk-s0517a:1989_12: niccanimittādīnañca abhāvā saguṇato ca tesaṃyeva nimittānaṃ abhāvā animittasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:1989_13: karotīti ārammaṇato ca animittavimokkhoti nāmampi labhati.
atk-s0517a:1990_1: Maggakkhaṇaṃ pana muñcitvā vipassanākkhaṇe vimokkho nāma natthi.
atk-s0517a:1990_2: Paṭhamaṃ vuttoyeva pana maggavimokkho “paṭivedhakāle”ti vacanena visesetvā dassito.
atk-s0517a:1990_3: “Yo cāyaṃ puggalo saddhāvimutto”tiādikā dve vārā ca “aniccato manasikaronto sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilabhatī”tiādiko vāro ca saṅkhitto,
atk-s0517a:1990_5: Ye hi keci nekkhammantiādiko vāro vuttanayeneva veditabboti.
atk-s0517a:1991_1: Puna vimokkhamukhāni ca vimokkhe ca anekadhā niddisitukāmo aniccato manasikarontotiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1991_4: Passatīti teneva ñāṇena cakkhunā viya passati.
atk-s0517a:1991_6: tassa paccakkhato ñāṇena diṭṭhassa anugamanenāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1991_9: Nimittanti santatighanavinibbhogena niccasaññāya pahīnattā ārammaṇabhūtaṃ saṅkhāranimittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0517a:1991_10: Tena vuccati sammādassananti tena yathābhūtajānanena taṃ ñāṇaṃ “sammādassana”nti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1991_11: Pavattanti dukkhappattākāre sukhasaññaṃ ugghāṭetvā sukhasaññāya pahānena paṇidhisaṅkhātāya taṇhāya pahīnattā
atk-s0517a:1991_13: Nimittañca pavattañcāti nānādhātumanasikārasambhavena samūhaghanavinibbhogena ubhayathāpi attasaññāya
atk-s0517a:1991_15: Yañca yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇantiādittayaṃ idāni vuttameva, na aññaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1991_16: Bhayato upaṭṭhātīti niccasukhaattābhāvadassanato yathākkamaṃ taṃ taṃ bhayato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:1991_17: Yā ca bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññātiādinā “udayabbayānupassanāñāṇaṃ bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:1991_19: anulomañāṇa”nti vuttesu paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhisaṅkhātesu navasu vipassanāñāṇesu bhayatupaṭṭhānasambandhena
atk-s0517a:1991_20: avatthābhedena bhinnāni ekaṭṭhāni tīṇi ñāṇāni vuttāni,

atk-s0517a:2024_9: Etehi pana tīhi muttaṃ punappunaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0517a:2025_0: Aparaṃ vā catubbidhaṃ kammaṃ janakaṃ upatthambhakaṃ upapīḷakaṃ upaghātakanti.
atk-s0517a:2025_1: Tattha janakaṃ nāma kusalampi hoti akusalampi.
atk-s0517a:2025_4: aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti,
atk-s0517a:2025_6: Upapīḷakaṃ aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti bādhati,
atk-s0517a:2025_8: Upaghātakaṃ pana kusalampi akusalampi samānaṃ aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ ghātetvā tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti.
atk-s0517a:2025_9: Evaṃ pana kammena kate okāse taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma vuccati.
atk-s0517a:2026_0: Iti imesaṃ dvādasannaṃ kammānaṃ kammantarañca vipākantarañca buddhānaṃ kammavipākañāṇasseva yāthāvasarasato pākaṭaṃ hoti asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi.
atk-s0517a:2026_1: Vipassakena pana kammantaraṃ vipākantarañca ekadesato jānitabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2027_1: Evaṃ suddhikakammavasena paṭhamavāraṃ vatvā tadeva kammaṃ dvidhā vibhajitvā kusalākusalādiyugalavasena dasahi pariyāyehi apare dasa vārā vuttā.
atk-s0517a:2027_14: akusalaṃ dukkhaphalavattā dukkhavipākanti evametesaṃ nānākāro veditabboti.
atk-s0517a:2031_1: Idāni tassa kammassa paccayabhūte vipallāse dassentena kathitāya suttantapubbaṅgamāya vipallāsakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a:2031_2: Suttante tāva saññāvipallāsāti saññāya vipallatthabhāvā viparītabhāvā,
atk-s0517a:2031_5: Cittakiccassa dubbalaṭṭhāne diṭṭhivirahitāya akusalasaññāya sakakiccassa balavakāle saññāvipallāso.
atk-s0517a:2031_11: Ajātabuddhidārakassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya hi saññā ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānākāramattaggahaṇato.
atk-s0517a:2031_12: Gāmikapurisassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya cittaṃ lakkhaṇapaṭivedhassāpi sampāpanato.
atk-s0517a:2031_13: Kammārassa mahāsaṇḍāsena ayogahaṇaṃ viya diṭṭhi abhinivissa parāmasanato.
atk-s0517a:2031_14: Anicce niccanti saññāvipallāsoti anicce vatthusmiṃ “niccaṃ ida”nti evaṃ gahetvā uppajjanakasaññā saññāvipallāso.
atk-s0517a:2031_16: Na saññāvipallāso na cittavipallāso na diṭṭhivipallāsoti catūsu vatthūsu dvādasannaṃ vipallāsaggāhānaṃ abhāvā yāthāvaggahaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2032_0: Gāthāsu anattani ca attāti anattani attāti evaṃsaññinoti attho.
atk-s0517a:2032_3: Khittacittāti saññādiṭṭhīhi viya uppajjamānena khittena vibbhantena cittena samannāgatā.
atk-s0517a:2032_6: Atha vā saññāpubbaṅgamattā diṭṭhiyā paṭhamaṃ catūhi padehi saññāvipallāso vutto,
atk-s0517a:2032_9: Visaññinoti tīhi vipallāsaggāhehi pakatisaññāvirahitā mohaṃ gatā “mucchito visavegena,
atk-s0517a:2032_11: Te yogayuttā mārassāti te janā sattā mārassa yoge yuttā nāma honti.
atk-s0517a:2032_12: Ayogakkheminoti catūhi yogehi ītīhi khemaṃ nibbānaṃ appattā.
atk-s0517a:2032_13: Sattā gacchanti saṃsāranti teyeva puggalā saṃsāraṃ saṃsaranti. Kasmā?
atk-s0517a:2032_20: Imaṃ dhammaṃ pakāsentīti vipallāsappahānaṃ dhammaṃ jotenti.
atk-s0517a:2032_22: Tesaṃ sutvānāti tesaṃ buddhānaṃ dhammaṃ sutvāna.
atk-s0517a:2032_29: Atha vā anattani vatthusmiṃ attā natthīti addakkhuṃ.
atk-s0517a:2032_31: Sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ upaccagunti sakalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkantā.
atk-s0517a:2033_2: Cittaṃ uppajjatīti mohakālussiyassa appahīnattā saññāmattaṃ vā cittamattaṃ vā uppajjati,
atk-s0517a:2033_9: Ime dve anāgāmissa pahīnāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2033_10: Tasmā idaṃ dvayaṃ sotāpannasakadāgāmino sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2033_11: Anāgāmino kāmarāgassa pahīnattā “asubhe subha”nti saññācittavipallāsānañca pahānaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2033_12: Dvīsu vatthūsūtiādīhi padehi pahīnāpahīne nigametvā dasseti.
atk-s0517a:2033_14: “anattani attā”ti imesu dvīsu vatthūsu cha vipallāsā pahīnā.
atk-s0517a:2033_16: “asubhe subha”nti imesu dvīsu vatthūsu dve diṭṭhivipallāsā pahīnā.
atk-s0517a:2033_19: Catūsu vatthūsūti cattāri ekato katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2033_22: Cattāroti dukkhāsubhavatthūsu ekekasmiṃ dve dve saññācittavipallāsāti cattāro.
atk-s0517a:2033_23: Kesuci potthakesu “cha dvīsū”ti vuttaṭṭhānesupi evameva likhitanti.
atk-s0517a:2037_1: Idāni tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vipallāsānaṃ pahānakaraṃ ariyamaggaṃ dassentena kathitāya maggakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a:2037_2: Tattha maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggoti yo buddhasāsane maggoti vuccati,
atk-s0517a:2037_3: so kenaṭṭhena maggo nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0517a:2037_4: Micchādiṭṭhiyā pahānāyātiādīsu dasasu pariyāyesu paṭhamo paṭhamo tassa tassa maggaṅgassa ujuvipaccanīkavasena vutto.
atk-s0517a:2037_5: Maggo ceva hetu cāti tassa tassa kiccassa karaṇāya paṭipadaṭṭhena maggo,
atk-s0517a:2037_7: Tena maggassa paṭipadaṭṭho sampāpakaṭṭho ca vutto hoti.
atk-s0517a:2037_8: “Ayaṃ maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā”tiādīsu hi paṭipadā maggo,
atk-s0517a:2037_10: Evaṃ dvīhi dvīhi padehi “maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo”ti pucchāya vissajjanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:2037_11: Sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanāyāti attanā sahajātānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayādibhāvena upatthambhanabhāvāya.
atk-s0517a:2037_13: Paṭivedhādivisodhanāyāti ettha yasmā “ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ,
atk-s0517a:2037_14: sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ diṭṭhi ca ujukā”ti vacanato sīlañca diṭṭhi ca saccapaṭivedhassa ādi.
atk-s0517a:2037_21: Saccābhisamayāyāti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ ekābhisamayāya kiccanipphattivasena ekapaṭivedhāya.
atk-s0517a:2037_22: Nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāyāti cittassa vā puggalassa vā nibbāne patiṭṭhāpanatthāya.
atk-s0517a:2037_23: Sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇādīsu aṭṭha maggaṅgāni ekato katvā taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesappahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2037_25: Yasmā uparūparimaggenāpi suṭṭhu ādivisodhanā suṭṭhu cittavodānañca hoti,
atk-s0517a:2038_0: Dassanamaggotiādīhi yāva pariyosānā tassa dhammassa lakkhaṇavasena maggaṭṭho vutto.
atk-s0517a:2038_3: Hetuṭṭhena maggoti ca aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo niddiṭṭho.
atk-s0517a:2038_5: Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyāti ādīni ca indriyādīnaṃ atthavasena vuttāni,
atk-s0517a:2038_8: Sabbepi te dhammā nibbānassa paṭipadaṭṭhena maggo.
atk-s0517a:2038_9: Ante vuttaṃ nibbānaṃ pana saṃsāradukkhābhibhūtehi dukkhanissaraṇatthikehi sappurisehi maggīyati gavesīyatīti maggoti vuttanti veditabbanti.
atk-s0517a:2042_1: Idāni tassa maggassa maṇḍapeyyattaṃ dassentena kathitāya bhagavato vacanekadesapubbaṅgamāya maṇḍapeyyakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a:2042_2: Tattha maṇḍapeyyanti yathā sampannaṃ nimmalaṃ vippasannaṃ sappi sappimaṇḍoti vuccati,
atk-s0517a:2042_5: Yañhi pivitvā antaravīthiyaṃ patitā visaññino attano sāṭakādīnampi assāmikā honti,
atk-s0517a:2042_7: Mayhaṃ pana idaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ sampannattā nimmalattā vippasannattā maṇḍañca
atk-s0517a:2042_9: Maṇḍo peyyo etthāti maṇḍapeyyaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
atk-s0517a:2042_13: sikkhattayaṃ nibbānatthāya pavattanato brahmatthāya cariyāti brahmacariyanti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:2042_18: Bāhirakañhi bhesajjamaṇḍaṃ vejjassa asammukhā pivantānaṃ pamāṇaṃ vā uggamananiggamanaṃ vā na jānāmāti āsaṅkā hoti.
atk-s0517a:2042_19: Vejjassa sammukhā pana vejjo jānissatīti nirāsaṅkā pivanti.
atk-s0517a:2042_20: Evamevaṃ amhākañca dhammassāmī satthā sammukhībhūtoti vīriyaṃ katvā pivathāti maṇḍapāne sanniyojeti.
atk-s0517a:2042_22: Apica “satthā bhagavā satthavāho”tiādinā niddesanayenapettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:2043_4: Parinibbutepi pana satthari ekadesena maṇḍattayaṃ pavattatiyeva.
atk-s0517a:2043_5: Teneva cassa niddese “satthari sammukhībhūte”ti avatvā katamo desanāmaṇḍotiādi vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2045_0: Ācikkhanāti desetabbānaṃ saccādīnaṃ imāni nāmānīti nāmavasena kathanā.
atk-s0517a:2045_13: Atha vā ācikkhanāti desanādīnaṃ channaṃ padānaṃ mūlapadaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2045_14: Desanādīni cha padāni tassa atthavivaraṇatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-s0517a:2045_15: Tattha desanāti ugghaṭitaññūnaṃ vasena saṅkhepato paṭhamaṃ uddesavasena desanā.
atk-s0517a:2045_16: Ugghaṭitaññū hi saṅkhepena vuttaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttañca paṭivijjhanti.
atk-s0517a:2045_17: Paññāpanāti vipañcitaññūnaṃ vasena tesaṃ cittatosanena buddhinisānena ca paṭhamaṃ saṅkhittassa vitthārato niddesavasena paññāpanā.
atk-s0517a:2045_18: Paṭṭhapanāti tesaṃyeva niddiṭṭhassa niddesassa paṭiniddesavasena vitthārataravacanena paññāpanā.
atk-s0517a:2045_26: Ete hi bhikkhuādayo paṭivedhavasena dhammadesanaṃ paṭiggaṇhantīti paṭiggahā.
atk-s0517a:2045_28: Ariyamaggo nibbānena saṃsandanato brahmatthāya cariyāti brahmacariyanti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:2046_1: Idāni adhimokkhamaṇḍotiādīhi tasmiṃ maggakkhaṇe vijjamānāni indriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgāni maṇḍapeyyavidhāne yojetvā dasseti.
atk-s0517a:2046_5: Saddhindriyassa adhimokkhamaṇḍaṃ pivatīti maṇḍapeyyanti saddhindriyato adhimokkhamaṇḍassa anaññattepi sati aññaṃ viya katvā vohāravasena vuccati,
atk-s0517a:2046_6: yathā loke nisadapotako nisadapotasarīrassa anaññattepi sati nisadapotassa sarīranti vuccati,
atk-s0517a:2046_7: yathā ca pāḷiyaṃ “phusitatta”ntiādīsu dhammato anaññopi bhāvo añño viya vutto,
atk-s0517a:2046_8: yathā ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “phusanalakkhaṇo phasso”tiādīsu dhammato anaññampi lakkhaṇaṃ aññaṃ viya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0517a:2046_11: Taṃsamaṅgipuggalo taṃ maṇḍaṃ pivatīti katvā tena puggalena so maṇḍo pātabbato maṇḍapeyyaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:2046_14: Apubbesu pana pariḷāhoti pīṇanalakkhaṇāya pītiyā paṭipakkho kilesasantāpo.
atk-s0517a:2047_1: Puna aññena pariyāyena maṇḍapeyyavidhiṃ niddisitukāmo atthi maṇḍotiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:2047_15: Imasmiṃ pariyāye maṇḍassa peyyaṃ maṇḍapeyyanti attho vutto hoti.
atk-s0517a:2048_0: Evaṃ indriyādibodhipakkhiyadhammapaṭipāṭiyā indriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgānaṃ vasena maṇḍapeyyaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0517a:2048_1: puna ante ṭhitaṃ brahmacariyamaṇḍaṃ dassento maggassa padhānattā maggaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā uppaṭipāṭivasena
atk-s0517a:2048_3: Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyā maṇḍotiādayo yathāyogaṃ lokiyalokuttarā maṇḍā.
atk-s0517a:2048_5: Tathaṭṭhena saccā maṇḍoti ettha pana dukkhasamudayānaṃ maṇḍattābhāvā mahāhatthipadasutte viya saccañāṇāni saccāti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2055_1: Idāni maṇḍapeyyaguṇassa ariyamaggassa yuganaddhaguṇaṃ dassentena kathitāya suttantapubbaṅgamāya yuganaddhakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a:2055_2: Yasmā pana dhammasenāpati dhammarāje dharamāneyeva dhammarājassa parinibbānasaṃvacchare parinibbuto,
atk-s0517a:2055_3: tasmā dhammarāje dharamāneyeva dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena desitaṃ idaṃ suttantaṃ tasseva sammukhā sutvā evaṃ me sutantiādimāhāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2055_7: So hi jāyamānoyeva kule ānandaṃ bhusaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0517a:2055_10: Tassa hi nagarassa ārāmapokkharaṇīādīsu tesu tesu ṭhānesu kosambarukkhā ussannā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0517a:2056_1: Kosambiyañhi tayo seṭṭhino ahesuṃ ghositaseṭṭhi kukkuṭaseṭṭhi pāvārikaseṭṭhīti.
atk-s0517a:2056_2: Te tayopi “loke buddho uppanno”ti sutvā pañcahi pañcahi sakaṭasatehi dānūpakaraṇāni gāhāpetvā sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0517a:2056_3: gantvā jetavanasamīpe khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā nisinnā
atk-s0517a:2056_4: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā satthāraṃ nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0517a:2056_5: aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā bhagavato pādamūle nipajjitvā sakajanapadagamanatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ yācitvā
atk-s0517a:2056_6: “suññāgāre kho gahapatayo tathāgatā abhiramantī”ti bhagavatā vutte “dinnā no bhagavatā paṭiññā”ti ñatvā
atk-s0517a:2056_7: ativiya tuṭṭhā dasabalaṃ vanditvā nikkhantā antarāmagge yojane yojane bhagavato nivāsatthaṃ vihāraṃ kārentā
atk-s0517a:2056_8: anupubbena kosambiṃ patvā attano attano ārāme mahantaṃ dhanapariccāgaṃ katvā bhagavato vihāre kārāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0517a:2056_9: Tattha ghositaseṭṭhinā kārito ghositārāmo nāma ahosi,
atk-s0517a:2057_0: Āvuso bhikkhavoti ettha buddhā bhagavanto sāvake ālapantā “bhikkhavo”ti ālapanti.
atk-s0517a:2057_1: Sāvakā pana “buddhehi sadisā mā homā”ti “āvuso”ti paṭhamaṃ vatvā pacchā “bhikkhavo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0517a:2057_2: Buddhehi ca ālapite bhikkhusaṅgho “bhadante”ti paṭivacanaṃ deti,
atk-s0517a:2058_8: Catūhi maggehīti upari vuccamānehi catūhi paṭipadāmaggehi,
atk-s0517a:2058_10: “Catūhi maggehī”ti visuñca vuttattā kassaci arahato paṭhamassa ariyamaggassa dhammuddhaccapubbaṅgamo maggo,
atk-s0517a:2058_13: ekassa yuganaddhapubbaṅgamoti evaṃ cattāropi paṭipadā maggā hontīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2058_14: Etesaṃ vā aññatarenāti etesaṃ catunnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ maggānaṃ ekena vā,
atk-s0517a:2058_16: Sukkhavipassakassa hi arahato dhammuddhaccapubbaṅgamaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ patvā sesamaggattayampi suddhavipassanāhiyeva
atk-s0517a:2058_18: Dhammuddhaccaviggahaṃ patvā vā appatvā vā samathapubbaṅgamādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ paṭipadānaṃ maggānaṃ ekekassa
atk-s0517a:2058_19: vasena pattacatumaggassa arahato arahattappatti itaraekekamaggapubbaṅgamā hoti.
atk-s0517a:2059_0: Samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvetīti samathaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ bhāveti,
atk-s0517a:2059_1: paṭhamaṃ samādhiṃ uppādetvā pacchā vipassanaṃ bhāvetīti attho.
atk-s0517a:2059_3: So taṃ maggantiādīsu ekacittakkhaṇikassa maggassa āsevanādīni nāma natthi,
atk-s0517a:2059_4: dutiyamaggādayo pana uppādento tameva maggaṃ “āsevati bhāveti bahulīkarotī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:2059_6: anusayā byantīhontīti yāva arahattamaggā kamena sabbe saññojanā pahīyanti,
atk-s0517a:2059_8: Anusayā byantīhontīti ca puna anuppattiyā vigatantā hontīti attho.
atk-s0517a:2060_0: Puna caparanti puna ca aparaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2060_1: Vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāvetīti vipassanaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā samathaṃ bhāveti,
atk-s0517a:2060_2: paṭhamaṃ vipassanaṃ uppādetvā pacchā samādhiṃ bhāvetīti attho.
atk-s0517a:2060_4: Ettha teneva cittena samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā teneva saṅkhāre sammasituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0517a:2061_0: Dhammuddhaccaviggahitaṃ mānasaṃ hotīti ettha mandapaññānaṃ vipassakānaṃ upakkilesavatthuttā vipassanupakkilesasaññitesu
atk-s0517a:2061_1: obhāsādīsu dasasu dhammesu bhantatāvasena uddhaccasahagatacittuppattiyā vikkhepasaṅkhātaṃ uddhaccaṃ dhammuddhaccaṃ,
atk-s0517a:2061_2: tena dhammuddhaccena viggahitaṃ virūpaggahitaṃ virodhamāpāditaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ dhammuddhaccaviggahitaṃ mānasaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:2061_3: tena vā dhammuddhaccena kāraṇabhūtena tammūlakataṇhāmānadiṭṭhuppattiyā viggahitaṃ mānasaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:2061_5: Hoti so āvuso samayoti iminā maggāmaggavavatthānena taṃ dhammuddhaccaṃ paṭibāhitvā puna vipassanāvīthiṃ paṭipannakālaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0517a:2061_6: Yaṃ taṃ cittanti yasmiṃ samaye taṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ okkamitvā pavattaṃ cittaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2061_7: Ajjhattameva santiṭṭhatīti vipassanāvīthiṃ paccotaritvā tasmiṃ samaye gocarajjhattasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe santiṭṭhati patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:2061_10: Samādhiyatīti sammā ādhiyati suṭṭhu ṭhitaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0517a:2064_1: Tassa suttantassa niddesakathāya tattha jāte dhammeti tasmiṃ samādhismiṃ jāte cittacetasike dhamme.
atk-s0517a:2064_4: Aṭṭhasu maggaṅgesu ekekopi hi maggoti vuccati.Āsevatīti sotāpattimaggavasena.
atk-s0517a:2064_7: Imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ avatthābhedepi sati āvajjanādīnaṃ sādhāraṇattā sadisameva vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0517a:2065_1: Ālokasaññāpaṭinissaggānupassanānaṃ antarāpeyyāle avikkhepādīni ca jhāna samāpattikasiṇānussatiasubhā
atk-s0517a:2065_2: ca dīghaṃ assāsādīni ca ānantarikasamādhiñāṇaniddese niddiṭṭhattā saṅkhittāni.
atk-s0517a:2065_4: Aniccānupassī assāsavasenātiādike suddhavipassanāvasena vuttacatukke pana taruṇavipassanākāle vipassanāsampayuttasamādhipubbaṅgamā
atk-s0517a:2066_1: Vipassanāpubbaṅgamavāre paṭhamaṃ aniccatotiādinā ārammaṇaṃ aniyametvā vipassanā vuttā,
atk-s0517a:2066_2: pacchā rūpaṃ aniccatotiādinā ārammaṇaṃ niyametvā vuttā.
atk-s0517a:2066_3: Tattha jātānanti tassā vipassanāya jātānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2066_6: Vipassanā ca taṃsampayuttadhammā ca nibbānaninnatāya ajjhāsayavasena nibbāne patiṭṭhitattā nibbānapatiṭṭhā nibbānārammaṇā.
atk-s0517a:2066_7: Patiṭṭhāpi hi ālambīyatīti ārammaṇaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0517a:2066_9: Aññattha pāḷiyampi hi patiṭṭhā “ārammaṇa”nti vuccanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0517a:2066_11: naḷāgāraṃ vā tiṇāgāraṃ vā sukkhaṃ koḷāpaṃ terovassikaṃ puratthimāya cepi disāya puriso ādittāya tiṇukkāya upasaṅkameyya,
atk-s0517a:2066_14: Tasmā tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ vosaggārammaṇatāya nibbānapatiṭṭhābhāvena hetubhūtena uppādito yo cittassa
atk-s0517a:2066_16: so samādhīti vipassanāto pacchā uppādito nibbedhabhāgiyo samādhi niddiṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0517a:2067_1: Yuganaddhaniddese yasmā heṭṭhā suttantavaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto yuganaddhakkamo purimadvayaniddesanayeneva pākaṭo,
atk-s0517a:2067_3: tasmā pubbabhāge anekantikaṃ yuganaddhabhāvanaṃ avatvā maggakkhaṇe ekantena labbhamānayuganaddhabhāvanameva dassento soḷasahi ākārehītiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:2067_4: Tattha ārammaṇaṭṭhenātiādīsu sattarasasu ākāresu ante uddiṭṭhaṃ yuganaddhaṃ mūlapadena ekaṭṭhattā taṃ vippahāya sesānaṃ vasena “soḷasahī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2067_10: Pariccāgaṭṭhenāti pahānepi sati puna anādiyanena pariccāgaṭṭhena.
atk-s0517a:2067_17: Anāsavaṭṭhenāti bandhanamokkhepi sati ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānāsavavirahitaṭṭhena.
atk-s0517a:2068_1: avijjaṃ pajahatoti yogino tassa tassa paṭipakkhappahānavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2068_3: Aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti samatho ce vipassanaṃ ativatteyya,
atk-s0517a:2068_7: Tasmā samatho ca vipassanaṃ anativattamāno kosajjapātaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0517a:2068_8: vipassanā samathaṃ anativattamānā uddhaccapātaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0517a:2068_9: Samatho samaṃ pavattamāno vipassanaṃ uddhaccapātato rakkhati,
atk-s0517a:2068_10: vipassanā samaṃ pavattamānā samathaṃ kosajjapātato rakkhati.
atk-s0517a:2068_12: samā hutvā pavattamānena aññamaññaṃ anativattamānā atthasiddhikarā honti.
atk-s0517a:2068_13: Tesaṃ maggakkhaṇe yuganaddhattaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanākkhaṇe yuganaddhattāyeva hoti.
atk-s0517a:2068_14: Pahānapariccāgavuṭṭhānavivaṭṭanakaraṇānaṃ maggakiccavasena vuttattā sakalassa maggakiccassa dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0517a:2068_15: uddhaccasahagatakilesā ca khandhā ca avijjāsahagatakilesā ca khandhā ca niddiṭṭhā.
atk-s0517a:2068_16: Sesānaṃ na tathā vuttattā paṭipakkhadhammamattadassanavasena uddhaccāvijjā eva niddiṭṭhā.
atk-s0517a:2069_0: Samādhi kāmāsavā vimutto hotīti samādhissa kāmacchandapaṭipakkhattā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2069_1: Rāgavirāgāti rāgassa virāgo samatikkamo etissā atthīti rāgavirāgā,
atk-s0517a:2069_9: Evaṃ cuddasa ākāre vissajjitvā ekarasaṭṭhañca anativattanaṭṭhañca avibhajitvāva imehi soḷasahi ākārehīti āha. Kasmā?
atk-s0517a:2069_10: Tesaṃ cuddasannaṃ ākārānaṃ ekekassa avasāne “ekarasā honti,
atk-s0517a:2069_12: aññamaññaṃ nātivattantī”ti niddiṭṭhattā te dvepi ākārā niddiṭṭhāva honti.
atk-s0517a:2071_1: Dhammuddhaccavāre aniccato manasikaroto obhāso uppajjatīti udayabbayānupassanāya ṭhitassa tīhi anupassanāhi
atk-s0517a:2071_2: punappunaṃ saṅkhāre vipassantassa vipassantassa vipassanāñāṇesu paripākagatesu tadaṅgavasena kilesappahānena
atk-s0517a:2071_3: parisuddhacittassa aniccato vā dukkhato vā anattato vā manasikārakkhaṇe vipassanāñāṇānubhāvena pakatiyāva
atk-s0517a:2071_4: obhāso uppajjatīti paṭhamaṃ tāva aniccato manasikaroto obhāso kathito.
atk-s0517a:2071_5: Akusalo vipassako tasmiṃ obhāse uppanne “na ca vata me ito pubbe evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo,
atk-s0517a:2071_11: So attano vipassanāvīthiṃ vissajjetvā vikkhepamāpanno vā obhāsameva taṇhādiṭṭhimaññanāhi maññamāno vā nisīdati.
atk-s0517a:2071_12: So kho panāyaṃ obhāso kassaci bhikkhuno pallaṅkaṭṭhānamattameva obhāsento uppajjati,
atk-s0517a:2071_17: kassaci pathavitalato yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā ekālokaṃ kurumāno.
atk-s0517a:2071_19: Ayañhi obhāso caturaṅgasamannāgatepi andhakāre taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ obhāsento uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:2072_0: Obhāso dhammoti obhāsaṃ āvajjatīti ayaṃ obhāso maggadhammo phaladhammoti vā taṃ taṃ obhāsaṃ manasi karoti.
atk-s0517a:2072_1: Tato vikkhepo uddhaccanti tato obhāsato dhammoti āvajjanakaraṇato vā yo uppajjati vikkhepo,
atk-s0517a:2072_3: Tena uddhaccena viggahitamānasoti tena evaṃ uppajjamānena uddhaccena virodhitacitto,
atk-s0517a:2072_4: tena vā uddhaccena kāraṇabhūtena tammūlakakilesuppattiyā virodhitacitto vipassako vipassanāvīthiṃ okkamitvā
atk-s0517a:2072_5: vikkhepaṃ vā tammūlakakilesesu vā ṭhitattā aniccato dukkhato anattato upaṭṭhānāni yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
atk-s0517a:2072_8: Hoti so samayoti evaṃ assādavasena upakkiliṭṭhacittassāpi yogino sace upaparikkhā uppajjati,
atk-s0517a:2072_14: udayabbayānupassanāyeva nibbānassa lokiko maggo”ti maggāmaggaṃ vavatthapetvā taṃ vikkhepaṃ parivajjayitvā
atk-s0517a:2072_15: udayabbayānupassanāya ṭhatvā sādhukaṃ saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati.
atk-s0517a:2073_0: Yaṃ taṃ cittanti yaṃ taṃ vipassanācittaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2073_2: Ñāṇaṃ uppajjatīti tasseva yogāvacarassa rūpārūpadhamme tulayantassa tīrayantassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva
atk-s0517a:2073_4: Pīti uppajjatīti tasseva tasmiṃ samaye khuddikā pīti,
atk-s0517a:2073_8: pharaṇā pītīti ayaṃ pañcavidhā vipassanāsampayuttā pīti sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:2073_9: Passaddhi uppajjatīti tasseva tasmiṃ samaye kāyacittānaṃ neva daratho,
atk-s0517a:2073_15: Atha kho panassa kāyacittāni passaddhāni lahūni mudūni kammaññāni paguṇāni suvisadāni ujukāniyeva honti.
atk-s0517a:2073_16: So imehi passaddhādīhi anuggahitakāyacitto tasmiṃ samaye amānusiṃ nāma ratiṃ anubhavati.
atk-s0517a:2075_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
atk-s0517a:2078_0: Evamassa imaṃ amānusiṃ ratiṃ sādhayamānā lahutādīhi sahitā vipassanāsampayuttā kāyacittapassaddhi uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:2078_1: Sukhaṃ uppajjatīti tasseva tasmiṃ samaye sakalasarīraṃ abhisandayamānaṃ vipassanāsampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:2078_2: Adhimokkho uppajjatīti tasseva tasmiṃ samaye cittacetasikānaṃ atisayapasādabhūtā vipassanāsampayuttā saddhā uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:2078_3: Paggaho uppajjatīti tasseva tasmiṃ samaye asithilamanaccāraddhaṃ supaggahitaṃ vipassanāsampayuttaṃ vīriyaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:2078_4: Upaṭṭhānaṃ uppajjatīti tasseva tasmiṃ samaye sūpaṭṭhitā suppatiṭṭhitā nikhātā acalā pabbatarājasadisā vipassanāsampayuttā sati uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:2078_5: So yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjati samannāharati manasi karoti paccavekkhati,
atk-s0517a:2078_6: taṃ taṃ ṭhānamassa okkantitvā pakkhanditvā dibbacakkhuno paraloko viya satiyā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:2079_1: Tasmiñhi samaye sabbasaṅkhāresu majjhattabhūtā vipassanupekkhāpi balavatī uppajjati,
atk-s0517a:2079_3: Sā hissa taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjantassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva pattapuṭe pakkhandatattanārāco viya ca sūrā tikhiṇā hutvā vahati.
atk-s0517a:2079_6: Vipassanāñāṇe hi gayhamāne “ñāṇaṃ uppajjatī”ti vipassanāñāṇassa āgatattā punaruttidoso hoti.
atk-s0517a:2079_10: Tasmā vipassanāsampayuttāya tatramajjhattupekkhāya vuccamānāya punaruttidoso ca na hoti,
atk-s0517a:2079_12: Yasmā ca pañcasu indriyesu “ñāṇaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upaṭṭhāna”nti paññindriyasaddhindriyavīriyindriyasatindriyāni niddiṭṭhāni,
atk-s0517a:2079_15: tasmā samappavatto samādhi puna samādhāne byāpārappahānakaraṇena “upekkhā”ti vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2080_0: Nikanti uppajjatīti evaṃ obhāsādipaṭimaṇḍitāya vipassanāya ālayaṃ kurumānā sukhumā santākārā nikanti uppajjati,
atk-s0517a:2080_1: yā kilesoti pariggahetumpi na sakkā hoti.
atk-s0517a:2080_3: evaṃ etesupi aññatarasmiṃ uppanne yogāvacaro “na ca vata me ito pubbe evarūpaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppannapubbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:2080_4: evarūpā pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upaṭṭhānaṃ upekkhā nikanti uppannapubbā,
atk-s0517a:2080_10: So attano mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā nikantimeva assādento nisīdati.
atk-s0517a:2080_11: Ettha ca obhāsādayo upakkilesavatthutāya upakkilesāti vuttā,
atk-s0517a:2080_13: Nikanti pana upakkileso ceva upakkilesavatthu ca.
atk-s0517a:2080_16: “Mama obhāso uppanno”ti gaṇhato hi diṭṭhiggāho hoti,
atk-s0517a:2080_20: Tathā sesesupīti evaṃ gāhavasena samatiṃsa upakkilesā honti.
atk-s0517a:2080_22: anattato manasikarototi vāresupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:2081_1: Evaṃ abhedato vipassanāvasena upakkilese dassetvā puna bhedavasena dassento rūpaṃ aniccato manasikarototiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:2081_2: Tattha jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato upaṭṭhānanti jarāmaraṇassa aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2082_1: Yasmā pubbe vuttānaṃ samatiṃsāya upakkilesānaṃ vasena akusalo abyatto yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu vikampati,
atk-s0517a:2082_5: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento obhāse ceva ñāṇe cātiādigāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0517a:2082_6: Tattha vikampatīti obhāsādike ārammaṇe nānākilesavasena vividhā kampati vedhati.
atk-s0517a:2082_7: Yehi cittaṃ pavedhatīti yehi passaddhisukhehi cittaṃ nānākilesavasena nānappakārena vedhati kampati.
atk-s0517a:2082_8: Tasmā passaddhiyā sukhe ceva yogāvacaro vikampatīti sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:2082_9: Upekkhāvajjanāya cevāti upekkhāsaṅkhātāya āvajjanāya ceva vikampati,
atk-s0517a:2082_12: Upekkhāya cāti heṭṭhā vuttappakārāya upekkhāya ca vikampati,
atk-s0517a:2082_14: Ettha ca dvinnaṃ upekkhānaṃ niddiṭṭhattā heṭṭhā “upekkhā uppajjatī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne ca ubhayathā attho vutto.
atk-s0517a:2082_15: Aniccānupassanādīsu ca ekekissāyeva āvajjanupekkhāya sabbhāvato ekekāyeva anupassanā aniccaṃ aniccaṃ,
atk-s0517a:2082_17: anattā anattāti punappunaṃ bhāvīyatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:2082_18: Yasmā pana kusalo paṇḍito byatto buddhisampanno yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu uppannesu “ayaṃ kho me obhāso uppanno,
atk-s0517a:2082_19: so kho panāyaṃ anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo”ti iti vā naṃ paññāya paricchindati upaparikkhati.
atk-s0517a:2082_24: Tasmāyaṃ avasavattanaṭṭhena anattāti passanto diṭṭhiṃ ugghāṭeti.
atk-s0517a:2082_28: Tasmāyaṃ hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccoti passanto mānaṃ samugghāṭeti.
atk-s0517a:2082_32: Tasmāyaṃ uppādavayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhoti passanto nikantiṃ pariyādiyati.
atk-s0517a:2083_6: Evaṃ samanupassanto obhāsādīsu na kampati na vedhati.
atk-s0517a:2083_7: Tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento imāni dasa ṭhānānīti gāthamāha.
atk-s0517a:2083_9: Paññā yassa pariccitāti yassa upakkilesavimuttāya paññāya paricitāni punappunaṃ phuṭṭhāni paribhāvitāni.
atk-s0517a:2083_10: Dhammuddhaccakusalo hotīti so paññāya paricitadasaṭṭhāno yogāvacaro pubbe vuttappakārassa dhammuddhaccassa yathāsabhāvapaṭivedhena cheko hoti.
atk-s0517a:2083_11: Na ca sammoha gacchatīti dhammuddhaccakusalattāyeva taṇhāmānadiṭṭhugghāṭavasena sammohañca na gacchati.
atk-s0517a:2084_0: Idāni pubbe vuttameva vidhiṃ aparena pariyāyena vibhāvetvā dassento vikkhipati ceva kilissati cātiādigāthamāha.
atk-s0517a:2084_1: Tattha mandapañño yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu vikkhepañca avasesakilesuppattiñca pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0517a:2084_5: Tikkhapañño vikkhepaṃ pāpuṇitvāpi taṃ adhimānaṃ pahāya vipassanaṃ ārabhati.
atk-s0517a:2084_8: Vikkhippati cevāti tesu mandapañño dhammuddhaccasaṅkhātaṃ vikkhepañceva pāpuṇīyati.
atk-s0517a:2084_11: Cavati cittabhāvanāti tassa mandapaññassa vipassanācittabhāvanā kilesesuyeva ṭhānato paṭipakkhāvihatattā cavati,
atk-s0517a:2084_13: Vikkhipati na kilissatīti majjhimapañño vikkhepena vikkhipati,
atk-s0517a:2084_15: Bhāvanā parihāyatīti tassa majjhimapaññassa adhimānikattā vipassanārambhābhāvena vipassanā parihāyati,
atk-s0517a:2084_17: Vikkhipati na kilissatīti tikkhapaññopi vikkhepena vikkhipati,
atk-s0517a:2084_19: Bhāvanā na parihāyatīti tassa tikkhapaññassa santepi vikkhepe taṃ adhimānavikkhepaṃ pahāya vipassanārambhasabbhāvena vipassanābhāvanā na parihāyati,
atk-s0517a:2084_21: Na ca vikkhipate cittaṃ na kilissatīti atitikkhapaññassa cittaṃ na vikkhepena vikkhipati,
atk-s0517a:2084_23: Na cavati cittabhāvanāti tassa vipassanācittabhāvanā na cavati,
atk-s0517a:2085_0: Imehi catūhi ṭhānehītiādīsu idāni vuttehi imehi catūhi ṭhānehi hetubhūtehi,
atk-s0517a:2085_1: karaṇabhūtehi vā obhāsādike dasa ṭhāne cittassa saṅkhepena ca vikkhepena ca viggahitaṃ mānasaṃ vikkhepakilesuppattivirahito
atk-s0517a:2085_2: catuttho kusalo mahāpañño yogāvacaro mandapaññādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ yogāvacarānaṃ mānasaṃ evañca evañca hotīti
atk-s0517a:2085_4: Saṅkhepoti cettha vikkhepassa ceva kilesānañca uppattivasena cittassa līnabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:2085_5: Vikkhepoti “vikkhipati na kilissatī”ti dvīsu ṭhānesu vuttavikkhepavasena cittassa uddhatabhāvo veditabboti.
atk-s0517a:2089_1: Idāni yuganaddhaguṇassa ariyamaggassa vasena saccaṭṭhaṃ saccapaṭivedhavisesaṃ saccalakkhaṇādividhānañca
atk-s0517a:2089_3: Tattha suttante tāva tathānīti yathāsabhāvavasena tacchāni.
atk-s0517a:2089_7: Na hi saccāni asaccāni nāma honti.
atk-s0517a:2089_9: Na hi asaccāni saccāni nāma honti.
atk-s0517a:2089_17: Na hi dukkhaṃ adukkhaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0517a:2092_5: paramatthato hi sabbāneva saccāni vedakakārakanibbutagamakābhāvato suññānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0517a:2093_0: “Dukkhameva hi, na koci dukkhito, kārako na, kiriyāva vijjati;
atk-s0517a:2094_0: Atthi nibbuti, na nibbuto pumā, maggamatthi, gamako na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0517a:2098_8: Ekattaṃ ekena ñāṇena paṭivijjhatīti pubbabhāge catunnaṃ saccānaṃ nānattekattaṃ svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā
atk-s0517a:2098_9: ṭhito maggakkhaṇe ekena maggañāṇena tathaṭṭhāditaṃtaṃekattaṃ paṭivijjhati. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0517a:2098_10: Nirodhasaccassa tathaṭṭhādike ekatte paṭividdhe sesasaccānampi tathaṭṭhādikaṃ ekattaṃ paṭividdhameva hoti.
atk-s0517a:2098_11: Yathā pubbabhāge pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nānattekattaṃ svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā ṭhitassa maggavuṭṭhānakāle
atk-s0517a:2098_12: aniccato vā dukkhato vā anattato vā vuṭṭhahantassa ekasmimpi khandhe aniccādito diṭṭhe sesakhandhāpi
atk-s0517a:2098_15: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho tathaṭṭhoti dukkhasaccassa pīḷanaṭṭhādiko catubbidho attho sabhāvaṭṭhena tathaṭṭho.
atk-s0517a:2099_6: Tāni hi tīṇi saccāni aniccāni ceva aniccattā dukkhāni ca.
atk-s0517a:2099_9: Yaṃ aniccañca dukkhañca anattā cāti tehi tīhi saha nirodhasaccañca saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2099_12: Taṃ saccanti tadeva saccacatukkaṃ yathāsabhāve avisaṃvādakaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2099_19: nirodhassa sacchikiriyaṭṭhe āvenikepi idha catūsupi saccesu ñātapariññāsabbhāvato pariññaṭṭhena,
atk-s0517a:2099_22: catunnaṃ saccānaṃ sacchikiriyasabbhāvato sacchikiriyaṭṭhenāti niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2099_23: Navahākārehi tathaṭṭhenātiādīsu paṭhamaṃ vuttanayeneva yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0517a:2101_1: Saccānaṃ kati lakkhaṇānītiādīsu upari vattabbāni cha lakkhaṇāni saṅkhatāsaṅkhatavasena dvidhā bhinditvā dve lakkhaṇānīti āha.
atk-s0517a:2101_10: na ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ saṅkhatassa saṅkhatamiti lakkhaṇañca asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhatamiti lakkhaṇañca.
atk-s0517a:2101_13: Na ca saṅkhataṃ vinā lakkhaṇaṃ paññāpetuṃ sakkā,
atk-s0517a:2102_0: Puna tadeva lakkhaṇadvayaṃ vitthārato dassento cha lakkhaṇānīti āha.
atk-s0517a:2102_2: Tāni hi paccayehi saṅgamma katattā saṅkhatāni.
atk-s0517a:2102_9: jarāya bhaṅgassa ca anipphannattā uppādavayaññathattaṃ na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2102_10: Saṅkhatanissitattā uppādavayaññathattaṃ na paññāyatīti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2102_14: Tattha “saṅkhatānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe saṅkhatāpi uppādalakkhaṇampi kālasaṅkhāto tassa khaṇopi paññāyati,
atk-s0517a:2102_15: uppāde vītivatte saṅkhatāpi jarālakkhaṇampi kālasaṅkhāto tassa khaṇopi paññāyati,
atk-s0517a:2102_16: bhaṅgakkhaṇe saṅkhatāpi jarāpi bhaṅgalakkhaṇampi kālasaṅkhāto tassa khaṇopi paññāyatī”ti khandhakavaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2102_18: Tañhi paccayehi samāgamma akatattā sayameva nipphannanti asaṅkhataṃ.
atk-s0517a:2102_21: Puna tadeva lakkhaṇadvayaṃ vitthārato dassento dvādasa lakkhaṇānīti āha.
atk-s0517a:2103_0: Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ kati kusalātiādīsu abyākatanti vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ rūpābyākataṃ nibbānābyākatanti catūsu abyākatesu nibbānābyākataṃ.
atk-s0517a:2103_1: Cattāripi hi kusalākusalalakkhaṇena na byākatattā abyākatāni.
atk-s0517a:2103_2: Siyā kusalanti kāmāvacararūpāvacarārūpāvacarakusalānaṃ vasena kusalampi bhaveyya.
atk-s0517a:2103_7: Yaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ akusalanti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ avasesaṃ akusalaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2103_8: Akusalaṭṭhena dve saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitānīti imāni dve dukkhasamudayasaccāni akusalaṭṭhena ekasaccena saṅgahitāni,
atk-s0517a:2103_10: Ekasaccaṃ dvīhi saccehi saṅgahitanti ekaṃ akusalasaccaṃ dvīhi dukkhasamudayasaccehi saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2103_12: Imāni dve dukkhamaggasaccāni kusalaṭṭhena ekasaccena saṅgahitāni,
atk-s0517a:2103_16: Imāni dve dukkhanirodhasaccāni abyākataṭṭhena ekasaccena saṅgahitāni,
atk-s0517a:2103_19: Tīṇi saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitānīti samudayamagganirodhasaccāni ekena akusalakusalābyākatabhūtena dukkhasaccena saṅgahitāni.
atk-s0517a:2103_20: Ekaṃ saccaṃ tīhi saccehi saṅgahitanti ekaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ visuṃ akusalakusalaabyākatabhūtehi samudayamagganirodhasaccehi saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2105_1: Puna aññassa suttantassa atthavasena saccappaṭivedhaṃ niddisitukāmo pubbe me,
atk-s0517a:2105_9: Etadahosīti bodhipallaṅke nisinnassa etaṃ parivitakkitaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0517a:2105_16: Somanassanti pītisomanassayogato sobhanaṃ mano assāti sumano,
atk-s0517a:2106_1: yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññāsiṃ na adhikena ñāṇena paṭivijjhiṃ,
atk-s0517a:2106_2: tāva anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ anuttaraṃ sabbaññubhāvaṃ abhisambuddho abhisametāvī arahanti nevāhaṃ paccaññāsiṃ
atk-s0517a:2106_7: Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādīti dassanakiccakaraṇena dassanasaṅkhātaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇañca me uppajji.
atk-s0517a:2106_10: Etāya eva phalapaccavekkhaṇāya magganibbānapaccavekkhaṇāpi vuttāva honti.
atk-s0517a:2106_12: Natthidāni punabbhavoti idāni puna uppatti natthi.
atk-s0517a:2108_1: Saccappaṭivedhañāṇayojanakkame ca ayaṃ rūpassa assādoti pahānappaṭivedhoti pubbabhāge “ayaṃ taṇhāsampayutto
atk-s0517a:2108_2: rūpassa assādo”ti ñatvā maggakkhaṇe samudayappahānasaṅkhāto samudayasaccappaṭivedho.
atk-s0517a:2108_5: sabbe te catūsu ariyasaccesu saṅgahaṃ gacchantī”tiādīsu viya “sacca”nti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:2108_6: Ayaṃ rūpassa ādīnavoti pariññāpaṭivedhoti pubbabhāge “ayaṃ rūpassa ādīnavo”ti ñatvā maggakkhaṇe dukkhapariññāsaṅkhāto dukkhasaccappaṭivedho.
atk-s0517a:2108_8: Idaṃ rūpassa nissaraṇanti sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhoti pubbabhāge “idaṃ rūpassa nissaraṇa”nti ñatvā maggakkhaṇe
atk-s0517a:2108_11: Yā imesu tīsu ṭhānesūti imesu yathāvuttesu tīsu samudayadukkhanirodhesu paṭivedhavasena pavattā yā diṭṭhi yo saṅkappoti yojanā.
atk-s0517a:2109_1: Puna aparena pariyāyena saccāni ca saccappaṭivedhañca dassento saccanti katihākārehi saccantiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:2109_2: Tattha yasmā sabbepi sabbaññubodhisattā bodhipallaṅke nisinnā jarāmaraṇādikassa dukkhasaccassa jātiādikaṃ samudayasaccaṃ “kiṃ nu kho”ti esanti,
atk-s0517a:2109_3: tathā esantā ca jarāmaraṇādikassa dukkhasaccassa jātiādikaṃ samudayasaccaṃ “paccayo”ti vavatthapento pariggaṇhanti,
atk-s0517a:2109_4: tasmā sā ca esanā so ca pariggaho saccānaṃ esanattā pariggahattā ca “sacca”nti katvā esanaṭṭhena pariggahaṭṭhenāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2109_7: Paṭivedhaṭṭhenāti pubbabhāge tathā esitānaṃ pariggahitānañca maggakkhaṇe ekapaṭivedhaṭṭhena.
atk-s0517a:2110_1: Kāraṇañhi yasmā phalaṃ nideti “handa naṃ gaṇhathā”ti appeti viya,
atk-s0517a:2110_12: Yasmā pana tassa jāti yathāvuttena atthena nidānañceva samudayo ca jāti ca pabhavo ca,
atk-s0517a:2111_6: Avijjā siyā dukkhasaccanti pana āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayaṭṭhenāti.
atk-s0517a:2115_1: Idāni saccappaṭivedhasiddhaṃ bojjhaṅgavisesaṃ dassentena kathitāya suttantapubbaṅgamāya bojjhaṅgakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a:2115_11: nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0517a:2115_13: Tassā dhammasāmaggīsaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viya.
atk-s0517a:2115_14: Yopesa yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako bodhīti vuccati,
atk-s0517a:2115_15: tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya.
atk-s0517a:2116_3: maggena vā kilesaniddāto pabujjhanatthāya phalena pabuddhabhāvatthāyāpīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:2116_6: Tīsupi hi ṭhānesu bodhāya nibbānapaṭivedhāya saṃvattanti.
atk-s0517a:2116_7: Etena bodhiyā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:2116_8: Bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgātiādīhi pañcahi catukkehi vuttānaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānaṃ abhiññeyyaniddese vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2116_9: Api ca bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgānaṃ sakiccakaraṇe samatthabhāvadassanatthaṃ kattuniddeso.
atk-s0517a:2116_10: Bujjhanaṭṭhenāti sakiccakaraṇasamatthattepi sati kattuno abhāvadassanatthaṃ bhāvaniddeso.
atk-s0517a:2116_11: Bodhentīti bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya bujjhantānaṃ yogīnaṃ payojakattā bojjhaṅgānaṃ hetukattuniddeso.
atk-s0517a:2116_13: Etehi bodhiyā aṅgā bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:2116_14: Bodhipakkhiyaṭṭhenāti bujjhanaṭṭhena bodhīti laddhanāmassa yogissa pakkhe bhavattā.
atk-s0517a:2116_16: Etehi bodhissa aṅgāti bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:2116_17: Buddhilabhanaṭṭhenātiādike chakke buddhilabhanaṭṭhenāti yogāvacarena buddhiyā pāpuṇanaṭṭhena.
atk-s0517a:2116_21: iti tīhi upasaggehi visesitā maggaphalabojjhaṅgāti vadanti.
atk-s0517a:2116_22: Sabbesampi dhammavohārena niddiṭṭhānaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ bodhiyā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2118_1: Mūlaṭṭhenātiādike mūlamūlake dasake mūlaṭṭhenāti vipassanādīsu purimā purimā bojjhaṅgā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ
atk-s0517a:2118_3: Mūlacariyaṭṭhenāti mūlaṃ hutvā cariyā pavatti mūlacariyā.
atk-s0517a:2118_6: Mūlapariggahaṭṭhenāti te eva bojjhaṅgā ādito pabhuti uppādanatthāya parigayhamānattā pariggahā,
atk-s0517a:2118_12: Te eva mūlāni ca chabbidhā pabhedabhinnattā paṭisambhidā cāti mūlapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0517a:2118_14: Mūlapaṭisambhidāpāpanaṭṭhenāti bojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyuttassa yogino taṃ mūlapaṭisambhidaṃ pāpanaṭṭhena.
atk-s0517a:2118_16: Sesesupi īdisesu puggalavohāresu bodhissa aṅgāti bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2118_17: Mūlapaṭisambhidāya vasībhāvappattānampīti īdisesupi niṭṭhāvacanesu phalabojjhaṅgāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2120_0: Sesesupi hetumūlakādīsu navasu dasakesu imināva nayena sādhāraṇavacanānaṃ attho veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:2120_1: Asādhāraṇesu pana yathāvuttā eva bojjhaṅgā yathāvuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ janakattā hetū nāma honti.
atk-s0517a:2120_5: “Sabbepi kusalā dhammā nekkhamma”nti vacanato nekkhammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0517a:2120_8: Tividhāpi bojjhaṅgā kilesehi suññattā tadaṅgavivekādivasena vivekā.
atk-s0517a:2121_1: Mūlaṭṭhaṃ bujjhantītiādayo ekekapadavasena niddiṭṭhā nava dasakā vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:2121_2: Vasībhāvappattānanti padaṃ pana vattamānavacanābhāvena na yojitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:2122_1: Puna thero attanā desitaṃ suttantaṃ uddisitvā tassa niddesavasena bojjhaṅgavidhiṃ dassetukāmo ekaṃ samayantiādikaṃ
atk-s0517a:2122_3: Attanā desitasuttattā eva cettha evaṃ me sutanti na vuttaṃ.
